story:
Artletica Yoga Mats are eco-friendly artistically designed yoga mats made from natural rubber with an innovative new technology for a stronger grip.

Our mission is to bring beauty to your exercise experience and our new yoga mat collection is a perfect solution.

Whether you are the master of every asana, or you just began practicing yoga - Artletica mats will bring joy and excitement to every workout. Besides, they make a fantastic gift for a fellow yoga lover.

 

 

Our designs were created in a competition featuring 400 artists with over a thousand submissions. With an overwhelming number of great concepts we narrowed down to the most balanced line that would be inspiring and not distracting.

The new collection carries the inspiration of India and the Far East while also capturing the modern monochromatic concepts born in New York City. Each creation has its own story and meaning behind it.

 

 

 

One of our main goals is to add value for our backers. The more we get exposed, the more we can afford to give back.

There is a powerful tool you can use to support our campaign and therefore gain these awesome perks. That tool is your word - tell our story to your yogi friends and share it on social media. As we attract more backers, you will gain greater benefits.

 

 

While we manufacture our yoga mats to the highest standard of quality, they may not be a perfect fit for everyone.

If you feel that the mat did not meet your expectations, simply contact us within 30 days of receiving your mat and we will send you a full refund.
story_txt: Artletica Yoga Mats are eco-friendly artistically designed yoga mats made from natural rubber with an innovative new technology for a stronger grip.Our mission is to bring beauty to your exercise experience and our new yoga mat collection is a perfect solution.Whether you are the master of every asana, or you just began practicing yoga - Artletica mats will bring joy and excitement to every workout. Besides, they make a fantastic gift for a fellow yoga lover.  Our designs were created in a competition featuring 400 artists with over a thousand submissions. With an overwhelming number of great concepts we narrowed down to the most balanced line that would be inspiring and not distracting.The new collection carries the inspiration of India and the Far East while also capturing the modern monochromatic concepts born in New York City. Each creation has its own story and meaning behind it.   One of our main goals is to add value for our backers. The more we get exposed, the more we can afford to give back.There is a powerful tool you can use to support our campaign and therefore gain these awesome perks. That tool is your word - tell our story to your yogi friends and share it on social media. As we attract more backers, you will gain greater benefits.  While we manufacture our yoga mats to the highest standard of quality, they may not be a perfect fit for everyone.If you feel that the mat did not meet your expectations, simply contact us within 30 days of receiving your mat and we will send you a full refund.

story:
What is LPG:

Living Power Glass™ (LPG) is a complete line of glass and crystal products which are being manufactured and enhanced with the patented C5 Biotechnologies process of imprinting optimal electro-optical frequencies that are readily absorbed by water containing matter, changing it from a “chaotic” state to a harmonized and organized state.  These products will include the TASTY™  glass plate and mug along with the HEALTHY™ Pocket Pebble.  Also, beautiful crystals are being imprinted with the same patented technologies and will be used to make the Power Pet Charms, Purse Charms, Keychains and other stunning pieces of jewelry.

The Founder: Dr. Mark Hepp

Dr. Hepp was born and raised in Philadelphia, PA and attended Temple University School of Medicine prior to his Internship and Residency at Thomas Jefferson University Hospital. He completed his Cardiology Fellowship at Albert Einstein Medical Center before moving to Clearwater, FL in 1995 to enter private practice at Clearwater Cardiovascular Consultants where he has been working for the past 18 years as a Board Certified physician in Cardiovascular Disease and in Internal Medicine.  

Dr. Hepp has served as the President of the Florida Chapter as The Children’s Heart Foundation and as the former Chairman of the Department of Medicine at Morton Plant Mease Hospitals.   He is currently a Clinical Associate Professor in the Department of Internal Medicine, University of South Florida College of Medicine, Tampa, FL. He has been the Principal Investigator or Sub-Investigator in several hundred Clinical Research Protocols and has been a National Spokesman for many pharmaceutical companies including Novartis, Pfizer, Merck, Schering Plough, Forrest, and Astra Zeneca.  

Medicine is his passion and between 3 medical offices, four hospital affiliations and his teaching and research, he manages to stay very busy. His philosophy, however, is that you can never be too busy to solve a problem that makes the world a better place.  Thus, Dr. Hepp’s company, C5 Biotechnologies, LLC, remains focused upon developing safe and environmentally friendly products for the consumer while delivering the most effective applications that solve human and global concerns.

The Technology: 

C5 utilizes a series of patented technologies, along with a proprietary process, in the development of its products. C5′s unique and innovative products assist the body in harnessing and optimizing its natural healing capacity.

The C5 Biotechnologies LLC has been studied for over 7 years and has been implemented on other products, including the FRESHY™ food preservation device. This device was designed to help break one of Dr. Hepp's main global concerns; food scarcity and spoilage.

FRESHY™ is a patented, consumer based product that has been scientifically proven in multiple, independent laboratory studies to increase the shelf life of nearly ALL foods and to enhance the flavor and taste of fruits, vegetables, meats and dairy products. Additional studies have shown that FRESHY™ slows the growth of bacteria and potential microbial pathogens in the general food supply. As such, FRESHY™ is a discovery that holds promise for dramatically reducing food spoilage worldwide as well as significantly lowering the incidence of illness and death from food borne diseases.    

FRESHY™ is a clear poly-carbonate plastic egg shaped device containing liquid treated with patented energy imprinting technology. The liquid in FRESHY™ is comprised of natural spring water with a proprietary combination of minerals to create a unique blend of natural elements. The contents are all natural, non-toxic and environmentally safe. 

The results of FRESHY™ are mind blowing:


What we want to do with this Technology:

Please help us use this C5 patented technology, which has created FRESHY™, to mass produce the new imprinted glass items of LPG™.  We are creating a C5 energized glass mug and plate to enhance the flavor and freshness of all of your favorite drinks and foods along with supplying the health benefits of the biotechnologies.  We will call these products TASTY™.

We initially used our food preservation device with the technology.  We have now discovered that we could imprint glass products.  LPG™ products that the C5 biotechnologies have been imprinted on, like TASTY™, systematically controls its environment, reduces oxidation, ethylene gas and retains moisture in food which are the leading factors that foster mold, bacteria, nasty odors and rapid food spoilage in both refrigerators and pantries.

Laboratory tests reveal that TASTY™ accelerates the conversion of glycogen into sugars in fruits and vegetables. This advanced conversion resulted in improved taste, flavor and texture, as well as, maintained moisture and natural color.


The new TASTY™ glass mug will be unique in that it will improve the flavor of any liquids placed in it by either increasing the sweetness profile of the liquids (i.e. fruit juice) or taking the bitterness and edge out of other drinks (i.e. store bought beer). Additionally, the new enhanced glass will create a rich flavor profile for certain mixed drinks (i.e. Tequila Sunrise). 


The new TASTY™ glass plate will alter the taste of many foods placed on the plate for as short a time as two minutes.  Imagine sitting down in a fine dining seafood restaurant to a bronzed salmon entree on the new C5 plate and having the flavors of the spices and seasonings enriched beyond the finest restaurant. 

Beyond what the C5 Biotechnologies and LPG™ has to offer in the food and beverage industry with it's flavor enhancement and preservation, we are also looking to use these patented technologies to imprint other devices as well, including a portable pocket pebble, HEALTHY™.


The HEALTHY™ Pocket Pebble will be manufactured and enhanced with the patented C5 Biotechnologies process of imprinting optimal electro-optical frequencies that are readily absorbed by water containing matter, changing it from a “chaotic” state to a harmonized and organized state.  Continued proximity to this pebble creates an environment which scientists now recognize as superposition biochemistry (SPB). 

SPB stimulates enzymes to better use their subtle natural vibrations to manipulate a terahertz phenomenon called quantum mechanical tunneling which allows them to move through the normal energy barriers which slow their process in creating healthy biochemical reactions.  This results in a wide range of positive biochemical and neurochemical changes including rapid decreases in oxidative stress (free radical damage), inflammation and endotoxin load. 

Just as important it is for us to use this technology, we also created some items for rewards for our little furry friends; our pets.  Check out the Power Pet Charms as well.  These can easily be hooked to their collar.  Not only are they made with the enhanced crystals, but they also are fashionable designed with real stones such as amethyst, tiger eye, agate and lava rock!


Our Rewards

We appreciate everyone who contributes to the overall LPG revolution.  In exchange for your contribution, we want you to be able to enjoy all of the C5 enhanced products and their benefits.  Our rewards include:

  • Power Pet Charm: This device  is designed to attach to the collar of your pet. These charms comes in three different sizes, small, medium and large, to ensure a perfect fit for your pet.  The crystals on the charms are enhanced with the C5 Biotechnologies which maximizes your pets energy while reducing inflammation, fleas and ticks. Here are some examples of the Power Pet Charms:

This Power Pet Charm is and example of a charm designed for a small female pet.

This Power Pet Charm is an example of a charm designed for a medium male pet.

This Power Pet Charm is an example of charm designed for a large male pet.

  • The TASTY™ Plate and Mug:  These devices will charge foods and beverages with the c5 biotechnologies after only 2 minutes of contact, enhancing the taste and flavor.  Use the TASTY plate and mug to ensure impeccable/flawless meals.

  • The HEALTHY™ Pocket Pebble:  This pebble in enhanced with the C5 Biotechnologies and designed to be portable at your convenience.  Reducing inflammation and arthritic diseases, this will be the best device that you will always have at hand, right in your pocket!  This device will help keep you at optimal health for a long duration.

  • Formula 22™:  This product is the first ever organic, prebiotic anti-aging serum that is enhanced with the C5 Biotechnologies. Daily use of Formula 22 will increase healthy microorganism activity, resulting in a hyaluronic acid promotive environment that inhibits new wrinkling and repairs existing wrinkles.


Thank you for your support!

We are so excited about the launch of all the C5 enhanced devices.  Our production facility is able to handle all the items here in this Indiegogo project and we promise to deliver the items in a timely manner.  We're even more secure in our future as our business is all done here in the USA.

This technology has been studied for over 7 years and now we are at the point of launching the other devices included in the project and even have started thinking about other items for the home.  We know that once we complete this Indiegogo project that it will help us get a quick start to bringing other items to the market. We appreciate your interest and cannot wait for you to experience the benefits of the LPG and C5 biotechnology devices.

story:
Help us empower those suffering from eating disorders to fight the obsession with dieting and weight loss! 

Help us raise $100,000 to launch a global Peer to Peer Eating Disorder Prevention Website and expand our Peer Education and Prevention Program in the schools.

Learn more about our peer educators and their stories in the longer video below!




Why Is This Important?
Eating disorders are life-threatening and the incidences of anorexia, bulimia and binge eating disorder are increasing at a frightening pace, especially among our youth.
  •  In United States, 95% of those who have eating disorders (estimated at 20 million women and 10 million men) are between the ages of 12 and 25. (Wade, Keski-Rahkonen, & Hudson, 2011)
  • In United States, for females aged 14-24, the mortality rate associated with anorexia nervosa is 12 times higher than the death rate associated with all causes of death. (Sullivan, 1995)
  • In United States, the incidence of bulimia in 10-39 year old women TRIPLED between 1988 and 1993 (Hoek & van Hoeken, 2003).
How can you help make a difference? Help us launch a global Peer to Peer Eating Disorder Prevention Website 
Our goal is to launch a global website unique in its peer to peer approach and expand our current Peer Education Eating Disorder Prevention program. With your contribution, we can make it happen! Our website will combine unique features to make an effective, unique site that provides interactive eating disorder prevention education, recovery tools, and resources for teens all over the world! Here's a few things we plan to offer:
  • An international eating disorder pro-recovery website providing youth friendly information regarding prevention, recovery tools, and resources
  • Peer to peer videos with our peer educators speaking from their own experiences
  • Hands-on interactive tools that not only educate but engage youth in creating healthy relationships with their food and body
  • Culturally and size diverse peer educators supporting HAES®,  Health at Every Size. 
  • Expansion of our current Peer Education Program that provides peer to peer eating disorder prevention education in the schools and community
With your help, we can reach millions of young adults around the world and make a difference by preventing disordered eating and body hatred and help those suffering by providing resources and recovery tools.

Why Peer to Peer?
Research indicates that prevention is more effective when information is presented by peers rather than adults. Peer mentoring offers positive role models for those struggling with disordered eating and body image disturbances. As far as we know, THERE IS NOTHING LIKE THIS WEBSITE THAT OFFERS PEER TO PEER PREVENTION EDUCATION.
Beyond Hunger's Peer Education program has been providing services for over 15 years in the San Francisco Bay Area and we have a team of peers trained and able to present eating disorder prevention information in a youth friendly way. 

Why Beyond Hunger?
We understand the problem and are experienced in prevention, education and support. Beyond Hunger is a non-profit organization that has been providing prevention, education, and support for individuals with eating disorders for over 26 years. Beyond Hunger's peer educators have been providing eating disorder prevention in San Francisco Bay Area schools for over 15 years. Beyond Hunger was founded in 1988 by Carol Normandi, LMFT and Laurelee Roark, CCHT in San Rafael, California. Both Carol and Laurelee recovered from their own eating disorders, and were committed to providing low fee support groups for individuals struggling with eating disorders. In 1998 Carol and Laurelee published their first book, It's Not About Food: End Your Obsession with Food and Weight , in 2001 they published Over It: A Teens Guide to Ending the Obsession with Food and Weight, and in 2012 they created Body Love Cards: Meditation Cards to Inspire Body Love and Intuitive Wisdom.
We have a track record of making a difference.  In 2014, a comprehensive outcome study of our program found that Beyond Hunger group participants significantly improved on assessments measuring intuitive eating, body acceptance and emotional wisdom. An earlier statistical analysis concluded that Beyond Hunger clients who participated in our programs from 2002 through early 2005 showed, by multiple measures, a statistically significant improvement regarding a healthy attitude toward their bodies, healthy attitudes toward food, and healthy eating habits.

We are passionate about our work. Eating Disorders are both preventable and treatable. We all have witnessed first hand the severe consequences for those suffering from eating disorders, and we are well aware that the problem is becoming more severe. Yet studies indicate that prevention programs can alter knowledge, attitudes, and behaviors associated with eating disorders and disordered eating (NEDA). The earlier a person with an eating disorder seeks treatment, the greater the likelihood of physical and emotional recovery. Without treatment, up to 20% of people with serious eating disorders die. With treatment, that number falls to 2-3%. With treatment, about 60% of people with eating disorders recover. (ANRED). 


What We Need & What You Get

We need $100,000 to meet our goal of creating and sustaining a global peer to peer eating disorder prevention and education website, and expanding our Peer Education program. When we reach our goal, here's how the money will be spent: Project Management, Peer Educator Supervision, Administrative Support, Site Development, Graphic Design, Video Production, Site Maintenance, Overhead, Marketing, Indiegogo Fees, Perk Fulfillment, and scholarships for school presentations. 

If we are unable to reach this goal, the money raised will go to infrastructure and staff needed to update our current website, enhance our teen page and expand our current peer education program. In the process of creating this campaign, we have already acquired videos of our amazing peer educators; we're excited to be able to add these to our website!

What do you get? Besides our great perks, you get to know that you have made a difference in reaching out to our youth, and investing in their future by making an impact on a debilitating illness that impacts not only those with eating disorders, but families and friends too. 


Other Ways You Can Help: Take the Challenge!

Please help us get the word out! Take the challenge! Instead of pouring ice over your head, challenge yourself to forward this campaign to 20 friends!!! You can make the difference!

Finally, Thank You! We Couldn't Do It Without You!

For those of us who have recovered from eating disorders, we know first hand how the love and generosity from family and community members saved our lives. For those of us who have been in the eating disorder treatment community, we have spoken with many parents who have lost their children to eating disorders. Every dollar you donate, and every person to whom you forward this, makes an incredible difference in empowering our youth to be free from the obsession with food and weight and to live a fulfilling, healthy, and meaningful live. From the bottom of our hearts, we thank you.                            -- The Beyond Hunger Staff, Board, and Peer Educators

story:
Thank you all for your support! 


We didn't reach anywhere near our goal so perhaps the world is not ready for BEST.everywhere. 


We still are offering the BEST Plan to people in NYC. For anyone who would like to take part in this life-transforming program, check out our website at:

http://www.besteverywhere.me



This is a summary of our entire campaign and what the BEST.everywhere platform is all about.


Our "BESTies" talk about how this program positively changed their lives.


Healthy People = Healthy Planet

Our planet is on life support and it's all your fault! Well, not really all your fault. But accepting responsibility empowers you to change. 

Most of us know that we're all connected in profound ways. This is not just some new age mumbo-jumbo, even science confirms this reality. The physical, mental, and social well-being of individuals everywhere plays a crucial role in the health of our ecosystem.  

Source: Barton and Grant ( a ).

Click here to learn more about the global impact of poor health... 

The fact is,  we want to look good and be healthy but we don't know how to properly take care of ourselves. This not only affects our lives but also the world around us! 

The main philosophy behind our campaign is that in order to create positive change in our world you must first do it in individual lives. That's why we came up with the "B.E.S.T. Plan".


What is the B.E.S.T. Plan?

B.E.S.T. stands for "Balance, Energy, Strength, and Tranquility". It's a comprehensive fitness & wellness program that covers all aspects of your body, mind, and spirit. 

The reason why the BEST Plan is so successful compared to most programs is that you get a personal human coach that is accountable to your success! The techniques they employ are designed to deal with past conditioning and emotional obstacles related to nutrition so that you can have breakthroughs in the area of your health and well-being.

In our BEST Plan we use several different resources to help our "BESTies" (BEST plan members) including diet apps, workout tracking programs, scheduling apps, and just plain good 'ol fashioned e-mails. It's a bit messy, but it works!

Learn more on how our BEST Plan works. 


Campaign Goals

The most important things we aim to accomplish in this campaign is to:

1) Make it easier and cleaner for our BESTies to use the tools we provide by combining them into 1 platform which is accessible to them from anywhere.

2) Make the BEST Plan available to everyone, regardless of where they are in the world!

3) Allow any fitness studio, trainer, and coach to implement their own wellness program so that all fitness & wellness professionals can benefit from a comprehensive program like this. 

 

What is BEST.everywhere ?

BEST.everywhere is a comprehensive cloud-based software platform that will integrate already existing resources, online directories, fitness apps, and diet apps into one application. But most importantly, it will be a platform where a live human coach will guide you in creating your own personalized wellness routine and educate you in living this routine for life. 

If you have a software tool, blog, or website related to fitness & wellness, click here to see how we can work together on integrating this directly into BEST.everywhere. 

Any features that don't exist will be developed into BEST.everywhere by us. 

Also, this is not only for our coaches. The technology and tools will be available for any fitness studio, personal trainer, or coach to use with their own clients. See our "Coaching Tools" and "Custom Branded Platform" Perks.

Users will have all their fitness resources in one place with a professional coach guiding them.

Click here to see a detailed list of features in BEST.everywhere. 

An online coaching program will last 12 weeks. It will include:

  • A personal coach
  • Body assessments
  • Progress photo uploads
  • Weekly group coaching sessions via video chat
  • Workout scheduling and routines
  • Nutritional Education and planning
  • Food journaling and analysis
  • And more (click to learn more)...

You can use all the tools in BEST.everywhere without the personal coaching aspect for free. This is for tech-savvy people who don't mind learning all the tools that will be provided and who feel that they can manage their fitness & wellness schedule themselves.  


Why BEST.everywhere ?

There are dozens of fitness programs, thousands of facilities, and hundreds of fitness apps available. But BEST.everywhere includes 2 key components missing from these:

  1. It's fully comprehensive! It's not enough to just eat well, or just do yoga, or just strength-train. To get the most positive results in your life you need a balanced routine that covers all aspects of the intricate, marvelous machine you call your body. 
  2. It includes human guidance. You can sign up for a gym membership, purchase all the fitness apps you can fit onto your smartphone, but that doesn't mean you'll get the results you desire. Why? Because who has time to actually learn how to use these programs?! BEST.everywhere will provide you with a personal human coach who will hold your hand and guide you in achieving your goals. Most importantly, they'll educate you and leave you with tools you can use for life!

Click here for more info on the problems BEST.everywhere solves. 


What BEST.everywhere is not.

It's important to emphasize that this is not another fitness & wellness application or website. Instead, we aim to partner with the best fitness and wellness applications already existing and bring their tools directly into the BEST.everywhere platform. For our software partners, this'll mean more users and greater success for their applications. Our development work in BEST.everywhere will be mostly integrating these existing tools via API's (Application Programming Interfaces) and developing any additional missing features needed to ensure it's a complete program. 

It is also necessary to emphasize that we're not trying to compete with other coaches and fitness facilities. Instead, we want to be able to create a comprehensive application which any coach, fitness facility, trainer, or expert can use to help the success of their clients (see our "Coaching Tools" and "Custom Branded Platform" Perks). They'll even be able to use the coaching tools with their own specific program and will not have to use the "BEST Plan methodology". The comprehensive tool-set available in BEST.everywhere  is meant to help increase the success of their business and clients. 

Finally, BEST.everywhere will not force users to follow a specific coaching program. Anybody will be able to create a profile in BEST.everywhere and use the tools to create and manage their own fitness and wellness routine for free!


Campaign funds and Perks.

All funds from the campaign will be used in the creation of the BEST.everywhere platform as well as the administrative and coaching needed to run it. Costs will include programmers and designers to develop the BEST.everywhere software platform and all "Custom Branded Platforms" (see "Custom Branded Platform" Perk). Funds will also pay for initial hosting fees for running these platforms. 

We will also need to cover administrative expenses for support to coaches and facilities who will be using this for their clients. This will also cover the development of a training program for BEST Plan coaches and hiring new coaches. Approximately  60% of the funds raised will go towards development costs while the remaining will be for coaches, training, administrative, hosting, and miscellaneous fees related to this campaign. 

Development of BEST.everywhere  will proceed once funding is received. It will then take approximately 8 - 12 months to release the first phase of BEST.everywhere, which will be enough to begin the coaching programs. However, BEST.everywhere will be a comprehensive platform that will continually evolve over course of 3 years and beyond. 

If we don't reach our full goal, we will still develop BEST.everywhere, but it will take longer to develop the full feature set we aim to include. Not reaching our goal will also mean less BEST Plan users to coach so we will naturally need less coaches which means lowered expenses. 

If we exceed our goal, this will mean that we'll need more coaches for the additional users. Also, it will mean we can hire more developers to develop the platform a lot faster and with more bells and whistles. 


"Thank You!" ($10)

To all of you. By helping us bring this campaign to life, it'll bring positive change to the lives of many. 

To show our appreciation, we'll post your name on the "thank-you" page in BEST.everywhere . You name will be a link to whatever URL you tell us to send it to. This can be your personal website, business website, or social network page. 


BESTie T-Shirt ($50)

Get our BESTie T-shirt showing your support for having Balance, Energy, Strength, and Tranquility everywhere! Male and Female styles in all sizes available (S, M, L, XL).


Autographed "Machito" Poster ($100)

Our 18" X 24" Machito poster personally autographed by the BEST.everywhere team. Includes the BESTie T-shirt and honorary "thank you" mention on our the BEST.Everywhere platform.


Launch Party ($150)

We will be holding a launch party in NYC (Manhattan) when we complete phase 1 of BEST.everywhere . This party will have:

  • Delightful organic food and hor dourves
  • Organic specialty red and white wines
  • The most delicious organic desserts you've ever tasted
  • A live DJ playing a variety of great music
  • Prizes and giveaways

We know how to party here in NYC!

This also includes:

  • BESTie T-Shirt
  • Machito Poster
  • Honorary "thank-you" mention on the BEST.everywhere platform


Become a BESTie ($500)

You do have the power to evoke change in your life and our planet. Now get the tools that'll help you do so. This is the 12 week "BEST Plan" coaching program that will be done through the BEST.everywhere  platform.

Learn more about becoming a BESTie...


Coaching Tools - 1 Year ($1,000)

For coaches, trainers, and facilities, this will allow you to use all the tools in BEST.everywhere for your own clients.

Learn more about Coaching Tools....


Custom Branded Platform ($10,000)

For coaches, trainers, and facilities, get your very own branded website with all the features to run your own fitness and wellness business.

Learn more about Custom Branded platform...


    Risks & Challenges

    Our goal is to make this platform as comprehensive as possible, meaning that everything will be covered as it pertains to your health and well-being. However, if we were to create a platform like this from scratch it would take many years and many million of dollars. 

    So our goal is to partner with as many existing software tools/providers as possible to incorporate them directly into BEST.everywhere . But there is a chance that some software providers may not allow us to integrate their tools into our platform. This could be for many reasons, including risk of losing branding, negatively affecting their monetization strategy, or maybe they just don't have an API. 

    This would be unfortunate for them because we are striving to make as many people successful from this platform as possible, including these software providers.  Our goal is to drive more users to their software, not compete with it. 

    In order to overcome this, we will do the following:

    • We will assure providers that their brand will be retained. This way people who are using a specific tool in BEST.everywhere will know who provided it. 
    • If the providers have a monetization strategy they think will be negatively affected, we will strive to incorporate this strategy into BEST.everywhere while still keeping the core tools free for our users. Or we will attempt to figure out a new monetization strategy that will work for everyone.
    • If the provider doesn't have an API we will see if there are any other quick and simple ways we can incorporate their tools. e.g. iframes, RSS feeds, etc.
    • If a provider doesn't want to partner with us or cannot, we will seek a competing provider who will be willing to.
    • If we cannot find a partner for a specific tool, we will develop the tool ourselves. For example, if we cannot find a partner who will provide the food journaling aspect, we will develop food journaling ourselves. This is only after all other possibilities are exhausted. 

    Therefore, in a worse case scenario, we will still get the comprehensive feature set into BEST.everywhere but it may take longer to develop the complete package. In this case, we will develop the most important tools first, which are the coaching tools. This way we can begin virtual coaching our clients as soon as possible. 

    It's important to emphasize that this campaign is a joint effort between 2 companies: Jedi Fitness LLC (dba human@ease), which is owned by Dishan Elise, and Cerybrum Corp, the development company owned by Javan Joel. Dishan and Javan are siblings and they are both passionate about and dedicated to this campaign. Therefore, if a tool will need to be developed, we will get it done! 


      Other Ways You Can Help

      We appreciate you coming this far! All of us knows or have known someone who suffers from severe health problems due to improper care of themselves. And all of us see the negative impact this has on you, your family, your community, and planet. 

      This is a program that really works! It has improved lives tremendously and will continue to do so through the Best.everywhere platform. So please get the word out there to your friends, family, and colleagues. Indiegogo has some great sharing tools that allows you to easily do this. 

      Any small effort helps immensely towards the big picture of a healthier, happier planet! 

      We thank you for all your help, and wish you the BEST!


      A funny satire video of our Fitness Protection Police enforcing fitness in Greenpoint, Brooklyn. 



      Dishan Elise and Javan Joel explain the campaign perks.



      Our original campaign video which painted a picture on the BEST Plan, the problem we're trying to solve, and how BEST.everywhere will help solve it.



      Javan Joel goes into more detail on how the technology in BEST.everywhere will work, specifically with a coaching program.



      Sources:
      http://www.greenfacts.org/en/ecosystems/
      http://www.who.int/globalchange/ecosystems/ecosys.pdf
      http://www.eea.europa.eu/soer/synthesis/synthesis/chapter5.xhtml
      http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Environmental_impact_of_pesticides


      "BESTie", "BEST Plan", and "BEST.everywhere " are all trademarks of JEDI Fitness, LLC.

story:
Our Story

Hilary Clinton is known for saying it takes a village to raise a child.

 

That was true for me for many years. Now days, it is more like it takes  a village to care for our aging parents.

 

The really cool thing is that a lot of the people who we love in our lives who are older are our friend's parents who we have also known for most of our lives.

 

For the first time ever, I am faced with a challenge with one of my parents. So I am feeling this first hand ever since my Mom fell.

 

My Mom is a woman who has spent her entire life raising any kid who needs her.

 

When my closest friends in elementary school's Mom died of MS, my Mom took in the kids for the next 15 years, no questions asked.

 

We always had at least 3-4 extra kids in the house on top of the 4 of us kids.

 

She is 72 and is still taking care of the neighbors kids daily for free. My Mom has been by my side every step of the way and is my motivation and rock. 

 

She has a potentially life threatening situation in what Dr. Oz calls the "triangle of death". http://www.doctoroz.com/videos/facing-triangle-death 

 

When she fell she landed face down breaking the nerves under her front 4 teeth. They got infected and were treated for the infection with antibiotics.

 

The infection will come back according to the doctors we have spoken to because there is now necrotic tissue there where the healthy nerves used to be.

 

Dr. Monte Buck who is an extraordinary dentist has agreed to do the surgery required. http://www.drmbuck.com/MeetDrBuck.aspx

 

I want to raise this money this way and further the conversation that it takes a village to care for our aging parents.

 

The Impact

The 4 of us kids love our Mom and she is and always has been a great support to her community.

It is important that she get the work needed.  We need your support though.

 

Obviously please do not donate unless you can afford to.

 

If you have extra and are happy to help out this wonderful lady then God Bless you and please do.

 

What We Need and What you Get

 

We need to raise the $8,400.00 out of pocket expense for the surgery and send it to Dr. Buck so that she will have the surgery completed.

 

We are offering a good value per donation to enhance your life as we are asking you to enhance ours.

We offer everything from financial planning reviews to dinner in Malibu and even a film crew to make a movie for you.

Then there are the amazing cakes! Yummmmm!!!!    See some pictures in the Gallery!!

Do you like the perks we listed to the right?

Other Ways You Can Help

I would like to hear any other stories and or suggestions people have for creative ways to help care for our aging parents.  Please feel free to email me at BKNB02@aol.com

 

**Please get the word out to anyone you know who might also like to help with my Mom in this area. Maybe on your facebook, twitter or personal email list.

 

Thank you very much!!

What We Need and What you Get
 

We need to raise the $8,400.00 out of pocket expense for the surgery and send it to Dr. Buck so that she will have the surgery completed. 
 
We are offering a good value per donation to enhance your life as we are asking you to enhance ours. 
We offer everything from financial planning reviews to dinner in Malibu and even a film crew to make a movie for you. 
Then there are the amazing cakes! Yummmmm!!!!    See some pictures in the Gallery!!
Do you like the perks we listed to the right?

Other Ways You Can Help
I would like to hear any other stories and or suggestions people have for creative ways to help care for our aging parents.  Please feel free to email me at BKNB02@aol.com
 
**Please get the word out to anyone you know who might also like to help with my Mom in this area. Maybe on your facebook, twitter or personal email list.
 
Thank you very much!!

story:
As one set of blades is shaving hair, the opposing set of blades is being dragged back over the skin, which pulls the shaved hair out from in-between its' blades. This makes cleaning or rinsing during a shave unnecessary, which is the reason why OmniShaver shavers shave so much faster than all other shavers.
 

Definition of Stropping - (Verb) The act of making a blade sharp or sharper in conjunction with the use of a “strop” (or leather strap). 

We can't really answer how long the OmniShaver’s blade edges will stay sharp. Although we can confidently say they will outlast all other known shaver's blade edges. If OmniShaver's blades are kept dry and clean between shaves they stay sharp for an extremely long time. This is because its' blade edges self-straighten and polish during use.

OmniShaver isn't promising that our blades will stay sharp forever. But if maintained, they will certainly stay sharp exponentially longer than other shavers on the market.

 


 



Designed so the blades will follow every contour of your back.

 
Pivots to 11 different locking positions. 
 

 
 
 



"I found the razor to be quite tricky to use at first but after two attempts I found it to be fairly easy to use. On my second attempt I tried using it in the shower with no lotion, just on my wet back and found it to work well.

Comparing it to a back razor I ordered 5-6 years ago of which I read reviews and watched demo videos of men with really haiiry backs using it successfully, your product blows it out of the proverbial waters. One back razor I used, within a few strokes, ripped my skin to bleeding and the blade clogged rendering it useless. It did not live up to the demos that I watched and the reviews that I read. Your product will take some beating, for sure.

I like the way your razor can be adjusted with a varying degree of angles which makes the hard to reach spots easy to do. It is also great to shave in any direction, confidently, knowing that chunks of skin are not going to come away from my back and have it look like Freddy Kruger has had some nightmare fun on me!!

Anyhoo, many thanks for inventing this back shaver, I hope and believe it will be a great seller, not only in the US but I am sure over here in the UK also. I am guessing I am the first bloke outside of your country to try? If so then it is an honor to be the first to use outside of your country!

Keep up the good work.

God Bless
John C." from United Kingdom
 

Expected Delivery Date: 

SPRING 2021


*Early Bird Purchasers will receive their product on January 2021
 

 

What if shaving were faster, safer (less skin irritation), easier and less expensive. OmniShaver offers improved results to that of currently available shavers and razors with features no others can offer.

 

 

 

 

 

 


 
 
As one set of blades is shaving hair, the opposing set of blades is being dragged back over the skin, which pulls the shaved hair out from in-between its' blades. This makes cleaning or rinsing during a shave unnecessary, which is the reason why OmniShaver shaves so much faster than all other shavers.
 
 

 

Definition of Stropping - (Verb) The act of making a blade sharp or sharper in conjunction with the use of a “strop” (or leather strap).

We can't really answer how long the OmniShaver’s blade edges stay sharp. Although we can confidently say they will outlast all other known shavers blades’ edges. If OmniShaver is kept dry and clean between shaves, it stays sharp for an extremely long time. This is because of its' blade edges self-straighten and polish (or “strop”) during use.

OmniShaver isn't promising  that our blades will stay sharp forever. But if maintained, they will certainly stay sharp exponentially longer than all other shavers on the market today.

 

Although individual experiences may vary, OmniShaver feels that if properly maintained and used, our shaver will provide at least twice the number of shaves other shavers or razors can provide.​

Approximate Shaving Cost Per Year ($) based on Razorpedia.com survey and a top shaver manufacturer's cartridges purchased at $20 per pack and disposed of every 2 weeks.

 

Our Product is Eco-Friendly in Several Ways:

#1- There is no need to rinse OmniShaver’s blades while shaving. According to the EPA, a typical shave will waste 10 gallons of water, so a year’s worth of daily shaves will waste 3,650 gallons of water per person.

#2- OmniShaver exponentially outlasts traditional shavers. According to the EPA, about 2 billion shavers are thrown away each year. OmniShaver's use will exponentially decrease that number.

#3- We incorporate recycled plastics into our production.

 

Omishaver’s Bi-Directional Blades gives a closer shave with fewer passes.

OmniShaver is the only shaver that "Self Cleans", meaning that you don't need to stop during your shave to rinse or clean out your shaver. Once the shave is complete, rinse with water.

OmniShaver is by far the "Fastest Way To Shave". Scalp shaving typically takes from 5-15 minutes but only OmniShaver can shave a full scalp in as little as 37 seconds.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

With proper care and maintenance, your OmniShaver should easily provide you with many more uses than other shavers on the market can provide. There are 3 things that will help to extend OmniShaver's useful life.

 

Opposing Blade, Bi-Directional Shaver. Protected by 8 Domestic and 16 International Patents.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

OmniShaver has blades, why is it better than other shavers?

 

#1-Unmatched Speed: Bidirectional shaving strokes shave faster than singular direction shaving strokes, and OmniShaver's low profile design makes control far superior to leveraged elongated handles, so those are two of the three key reasons why Omnishaver shaves so much faster than all other shavers.

#2-OmniShaver self-cleans during use, so as one side cuts hair, the other side is having it's cut hair pulled from its blades. This makes cleaning or rinsing during a shave unnecessary, which is the third key reasons why Omnishaver shaves so much faster than all other shavers.

#3-Self-Straighten and Polish During Use: We can't really answer how long the blade edges stay sharp, although I can confidently say they will outlast all other shaver's blades. If OmniShaver is kept dry and clean between shaves it doesn't really seem to ever get dull enough to warrant replacement. This is because it's blade edges self-straighten and polish (or "strop") during use. Example: My OmniShaver has been providing me with daily close shaves for almost 2 years now...that doesn't mean I'm promising that OmniShaver's blades will stay sharp forever, but if maintained, they will certainly stay sharp far longer than any other shaver's blades stay sharp.

#4-Less skin irritation / cuts / nicks: Skin irritation, nicks and/or cuts usually come from successive passes over skin that's been irritated, OmniShaver requires "fewer passes" to shave an area clean and therefore irritates the skin much less. Nicks and/or cuts can also come from dull blade edges being pressed harder to shave "one-last-time". OmniShaver’s blades self-straighten and polish during use, so maintaining its sharp edges helps to prevent nicks and/or cuts. The most common cause of nicks and/or cuts with traditional shavers are with their blade heads being tilted by a leveraged handle, which creates uneven angles of blade edge attack to the skin. With OmniShaver's low profile design, the blade head always maintains a parallel downward pressure plane relationship to that of its cutting surface, making angles of blade edge attack consistent throughout the shave. This makes nicks and/or cuts from gouging less likely.

 

How Long Do the Blades Last?

Although there is not a clear answer, how long the blade edges stay sharp, we can confidently say they will outlast all other shavers you've ever tried. If OmniShaver is kept dry and clean between shaves it doesn't really seem to ever get dull enough to warrant replacement. This is because it's blade edges straighten and polish (or "strop") during use. Example: My OmniShaver has been providing me with daily close shaves for almost 2 years now...that doesn't mean I'm promising that OmniShaver's blades will stay sharp forever, but if maintained, they will certainly stay sharp far longer than any other shaver's blades stay sharp.

Can the OmniShaver only be used on the scalp?

This particular model of OmniShaver is specifically designed for the scalp, legs, arms back and torso. It’s shaving head is too large to be used for the face. The new facial OmniShaver is being designed and will be released soon.

How Long Do the Blades Last?

Definition of Stropping - (Verb) The act of making a blade sharp or sharper in conjunction with the use of a “strop” (or leather strap).

We can't really answer how long the OmniShaver’s blade edges stay sharp. Although we can confidently say they will outlast all other known shaver’s blades’ edges. If OmniShaver is kept dry and clean between shaves, it stays sharp for an extremely long time. This is because its' blade edges self-straighten and polish (or “strop”) during use.

Example: One OmniShaver we’ve tested has been providing its user with daily close shaves in excess of 2 years. That doesn't mean we’re promising OmniShaver’s blades will stay sharp forever. But if maintained, they will certainly stay sharp exponentially longer than all other shavers on the market today.

Can the OmniShaver only be used on the scalp?

This particular model of OmniShaver is specifically designed for the scalp, legs, arms back and torso. Its shaving head is too large to be used for the face. The new facial OmniShaver is being designed and will be released soon.

Will OmniShaver Cut Me?

 

Nicks and/or cuts usually come from successive passes over skin that's been irritated. OmniShaver requires fewer passes and therefor irritates the skin less. Nicks and/or cuts can also come from dull blade edges being pressed harder to shave "one-last-time". OmniShaver’s blades’ self-straighten and self-polish during use, so maintaining it's sharp edges helps to prevent nick and/or cut problems. The most common cause of nicks and/or cuts with traditional shavers are with their blade heads being tilted by a leveraged handle, which creates uneven angles of blade edge attack to the skin. With OmniShaver, the blade head always maintains a parallel downward pressure plane relationship to that of it's cutting surface, making angles of blade edge attack consistent throughout the shave. This makes nicks and/or cuts from gouging less likely.

If I cut myself or my skin becomes irritated with a rash or bump what do I do?

There are only a few ways that blades typically snag on hair, and that is if they are dull, damaged, if there isn't enough lubrication or if the hair being shaved is a bit too long.

 

#1-Dull: There is a fix to this because the blades self-straighten and polish (or "strop") during use, so to tune them up, pick a 6" or 7" patch of hairless skin, like maybe on your forearm, lubricate it with hair conditioner and make 30 or so fast back and forth shaving passes over it. This should re-polish the blade edges for future use.

 

#2-Damaged: Look closely at the blade edges and see if you can detect any kinks or bends. Also, look at the bands on the ends of the blades to see if one is broken or if it has a sharp area sticking up. There is no solution if it's damaged.

 

#3-We're sure you are using good lubrication, but maybe instead try using a generous amount of hair conditioner because we've found that's one of the best lubrication.

 

#4-Give shaving a try with only 1 day of hair growth, then if no problems, try 2 days and then 3 days to see if hair length is a contributing factor.

#5-Apple Cider Vinegar is a great anti-inflammation remedy...just wipe it on any irritated skin (like razor burn or razor bumps) to help in aiding a speedy recovery.

Why doesn’t OmniShaver have any lubrication strips?

The strips are acknowledged by most manufacturers as a gimmick because shaving gels and lotions provide plenty of lubrication during a shave. If OmniShaver needed lubrication strips they would not be incorporated into the product, but the reason they are not used is that they are designed to last about a week, and because OmniShaver lasts for months and months, it wouldn't make sense to incorporate them into OmniShaver's design.

 

#1-Try using a shaving foam/lotion or gel that's designed for "sensitive" skin.

 

#2-Buy some Apple Cider Vinegar and after your shave, wipe it over the area you typically get the razor burn or razor bumps.

 

#3-This one is the most important: Omnishaver shaves so well that you only need to go over a specific area with a few backs and forth strokes. Many go over areas WAY too many times, or they will keep coming back to an area over and over, and that just sands your skin away. Shave an area clean and then move on to another, and then another until finished.

 

#4-Shave every day, then you'll get used to the movements, and fewer strokes will be needed to keep your scalp shaved. Fewer strokes = less chance for skin irritation.

I have Alopecia, is OmniShaver OK to use?

People with Alopecia often report having extremely sensitive skin. Full disclosure, OmniShaver is a bladed razor so it can be abrasive but less abrasive than a regular razor because it requires half as many stroking passes to shave an area clean. Fewer passes equal fewer opportunities for skin irritation.

Does OmniShaver come in any other colors?

OmniShaver will be offered in numerous other colors by Fall of 2018.

story:
About our product

Picoo provides kids with an interactive gaming experience. It stimulates kids to get together, get active, and get moving! Picoo’s starter set consists of four Picoos and five games. You can always download new games and install them on Picoo. Take Picoo with you, wherever you go. You don’t even need a WiFi connection to play. So what do you say, are you ready to play with Picoo?

Buy Picoo or make a donation to make outdoor play even more fun for kids all over the world!

The plan

  • To develop and produce Picoo at a reasonable price point, we have to produce larger quantities of Picoo. If we hit our target of €15.000 we can start the production later this year.

The Indiegogo advantage

  • By buying Picoo now you’ll get Picoo with a steep discount. And if you help us double our goal, we’ll throw in some extra games as well!

 

 

 

How does it work?

  1. Pick a game with a ga​me card or the Picoo app
  2. Scan the game card if you have chosen this option
  3. Hold your Picoos close so the game will get activated on all devices
  4. Click the button to start the game!

 

 

 

Key benefits

Infinite play

  • Five games are provided with your Picoo starter kit. After that, you can download and install new games at any time.

Get together

  • You can play with anyone: play with your family, or connect to friends when they come over.

Kidsproof: Sturdy and robust

  • Picoo is built to handle an accidental drop on the floor or a splash of water.

Whenever, wherever

  • It doesn’t matter if you’re in your backyard, at the park or on holiday. You can play Picoo whenever, wherever. There’s no need for a WiFi connection and the rechargeable battery is suitable for at least two hours of continuous playing time.

Easy to use

  • Picoo has been designed for ease of use - anyone can use them, even if you are not a ‘techie’.

Fun

  • Picoo games are fun for everyone, regardless of their age.

 

 

 

What parents say

We have play-tested Picoo with parents who had a Picoo set for one week. Their response? Well, see for yourself...

Parents' quotes

  • "We’ve just played Picoo for the first time and our three boys are super excited! We all really liked it."
  • "The kids (10yo boy & 12yo girl) and I like Picoo a lot and we’ve been playing with it daily. We’ve added game elements ourselves, like hide-and-seek, standing on one leg, and dancing. All in all I’m super excited about Picoo. Both as a mom and as a physical therapist for children."
  • "We’ve been having fun with Picoo! At home with the entire family, but also at school where I work. I’d also like Picoo for my scouting group and my son is looking forward to play Picoo on his birthday!"

 

 

 

What children say

The number one response we get from children is: "Can we play again? Please!!!". It's also their number two response. And number three.

As soon as they open the box, their eyes start sparkling. This is something unlike anything they have seen before. This. Is. Fun!

In less than a minute they're off for their first game. And one more. And another one. Once we finally get back the Picoos, the kids are smiling ear to ear. Exhausted, thrilled, happy.

What kids like about Picoo

  • "It's like you're in your own computer game!"
  • "It's different every time, so much fun!"
  • "Finally, no more cheating when playing outside with my brother."

What Picoo does for kids

  • Besides having a lot of fun while playing, children are working on their social skills by playing together with their friends.
  • Kids get physically active in a fun way. Running around together while gaming doesn't sound like exercise, right?

 

 

 

Technical specifications

Picoo's technology allows for endless possibilities. A range of sensors (movement, sound, tags, distance, ...) and feedback (light, sound, vibration), combined with some seriously smart processing ensure it's ready for endless outdoor adventures.

For those of you who like numbers, here are some specifics: 

Communication

  • Range: 50+ meters between players
  • Group size: up to 24 simultaneous players

Endurance

  • Battery life: at least 2 hours of continuous play
  • Charging: works with both 120V AC and 230V AC

Durability

  • Picoo is very durable for outdoor activities
  • Picoo is dust proof but does not like to be submerged in water

 

 

 

Paying without a credit card

If you are not in possession of a credit card, please contact us at info@picoo.nl. Together we will find a way for you to still support our Indiegogo campaign.

 

 

 

Other ways you can help

Are you ready to contribute to making outdoor play even more fun? You can help in many other ways than just buying Picoo

Tell your friends and family

  • Press the share button and tell everyone about this play revolution! And if you happen to know someone with press connections, please let us know!

Make a donation

  • Choose a price you feel comfortable with and make a donation by using the pink "Back it" button at the top of the page. It will help us to get Picoo to more children all around the world!

 

Picoo is featured on:

 

Click here for our press kit
story_txt:
About our productPicoo provides kids with an interactive gaming experience. It stimulates kids to get together, get active, and get moving! Picoo’s starter set consists of four Picoos and five games. You can always download new games and install them on Picoo. Take Picoo with you, wherever you go. You don’t even need a WiFi connection to play. So what do you say, are you ready to play with Picoo?Buy Picoo or make a donation to make outdoor play even more fun for kids all over the world!The planTo develop and produce Picoo at a reasonable price point, we have to produce larger quantities of Picoo. If we hit our target of €15.000 we can start the production later this year.The Indiegogo advantageBy buying Picoo now you’ll get Picoo with a steep discount. And if you help us double our goal, we’ll throw in some extra games as well!   How does it work?

Pick a game with a ga​me card or the Picoo app

Scan the game card if you have chosen this option

Hold your Picoos close so the game will get activated on all devices

Click the button to start the game!
   Key benefitsInfinite playFive games are provided with your Picoo starter kit. After that, you can download and install new games at any time.Get togetherYou can play with anyone: play with your family, or connect to friends when they come over.Kidsproof: Sturdy and robustPicoo is built to handle an accidental drop on the floor or a splash of water.Whenever, whereverIt doesn’t matter if you’re in your backyard, at the park or on holiday. You can play Picoo whenever, wherever. There’s no need for a WiFi connection and the rechargeable battery is suitable for at least two hours of continuous playing time.Easy to usePicoo has been designed for ease of use - anyone can use them, even if you are not a ‘techie’.FunPicoo games are fun for everyone, regardless of their age.   What parents sayWe have play-tested Picoo with parents who had a Picoo set for one week. Their response? Well, see for yourself...Parents' quotes
"We’ve just played Picoo for the first time and our three boys are super excited! We all really liked it."
"The kids (10yo boy & 12yo girl) and I like Picoo a lot and we’ve been playing with it daily. We’ve added game elements ourselves, like hide-and-seek, standing on one leg, and dancing. All in all I’m super excited about Picoo. Both as a mom and as a physical therapist for children."
"We’ve been having fun with Picoo! At home with the entire family, but also at school where I work. I’d also like Picoo for my scouting group and my son is looking forward to play Picoo on his birthday!"
   What children sayThe number one response we get from children is: "Can we play again? Please!!!". It's also their number two response. And number three.As soon as they open the box, their eyes start sparkling. This is something unlike anything they have seen before. This. Is. Fun!In less than a minute they're off for their first game. And one more. And another one. Once we finally get back the Picoos, the kids are smiling ear to ear. Exhausted, thrilled, happy.What kids like about Picoo
"It's like you're in your own computer game!"
"It's different every time, so much fun!"
"Finally, no more cheating when playing outside with my brother."
What Picoo does for kids
Besides having a lot of fun while playing, children are working on their social skills by playing together with their friends.
Kids get physically active in a fun way. Running around together while gaming doesn't sound like exercise, right?
   Technical specificationsPicoo's technology allows for endless possibilities. A range of sensors (movement, sound, tags, distance, ...) and feedback (light, sound, vibration), combined with some seriously smart processing ensure it's ready for endless outdoor adventures.For those of you who like numbers, here are some specifics: Communication
Range: 50+ meters between players
Group size: up to 24 simultaneous players
Endurance
Battery life: at least 2 hours of continuous play
Charging: works with both 120V AC and 230V AC
Durability
Picoo is very durable for outdoor activities
Picoo is dust proof but does not like to be submerged in water

story:
Introducing                   

        

Falls are the second leading cause of accidental injury deaths worldwide. Each year, an estimated 424,000 individuals die from falls globally (World Health Organization). Severe falls that require medical attention number to about 37 million each year. Despite these numbers, however, studies show that majority of serious consequences are not directly caused by falling, but are due to delayed assistance and treatment.

GRVTY Smart Fitness Band detects changes in an individual’s motion and body position, while algorithmically analyzing whether or not the person is accidentally falling. If the individual does fall,  GRVTY prompts a wireless transmitter to issue an alert through smart phones or desktops, tablets for quick response by providing the person’s location. Thus, it is easy to locate and help those who are wearing the smart band in life-threatening emergencies.

Such feature greatly cuts response time and serious complications brought by improper handling of injured individuals.

                       

Road traffic death occurs 1.24 million times per year. And texting while driving has now replaced drunk driving as the leading cause of accidents and deaths among teenage drivers (Transport Research Laboratory).  More alarmingly, over 50 percent of adults admitted that they have texted while driving. Such habit poses dangers as studies show that drivers who text are 23 times more likely to be involved in a crash compared to those who do not.

  

GRVTY knows if the wearer is texting while driving by analyzing motions of arms and hands, speed and smart phone use.  It can also detect driving habits like weaving, frequent swerving, sudden acceleration and stops. These are typically related to distracted driving due to texting. 

GRVTY detects these dangerous motion patterns and nudges the wearer with a vibration. This feature can avert possible accidents by alerting drivers of the dangers posed by their actions.

GRVTY keeps track of driving history and its learning algorithms turn data into actionable insights about driver safety.  It shares the information to the wearer while providing risk assessment of the person’s driving.  The driver can review the data and make personal adjustments to improve his/her driving.

In case of vehicular crash, GRVTY automatically  alerts emergency contacts for immediate response or rescue. The smart band sends out the distress call even if the wearer becomes unconscious or badly wounded.

                       

GRVTY is a fitness band that can monitor one’s exercise regimen, heart rate and sedentary habits.  It can alert the wearer to  encourage movement and motion with a vibration.

Sports enthusiasts will surely benefit from information on pulse rate, estimated calories burned and number of steps taken. The health buff can monitor his/her progress based on recorded hours of activity and inactivity.

                   

GRVTY Smart Fitness Wearable evaluates motion using accelerometers connected to a commercially-available micro controller.  The microprocessor receives input from the accelerometers and transmits the acceleration data to the user’s mobile device app.  GRVTY measures and records the acceleration along the x, y and z-axes when attached to the wearer's arm.

GRVTY reacts depending on the processed data.  A combination of frequency, duration, intensity, and patterns of movement can signal GRVTY to alert the wearer through a vibration or to send out an emergency message to authorities.

                                        

GRVTY makes full use of available technology by partnering the smart wearable with its very own GRVTY APP.

GRVTY App keeps a record of the wearer’s driving habits, then analyzes and correlates them with distracted driving patterns. The GRVTY App, then, provides a risk assessment to inform whether or not the wearer is a safe driver.

In case the wearer is involved in accidental falls or crashes, a loved one, a friend or an emergency contact will be automatically notified via GRVTY App.  The person will be easily located through smart phone GPS.

                          

                                        

GRVTY is the next generation of smart wearables! Please support us and be at the forefront of innovation!

                      

                                                         

We are a group of young and aspiring scientists and engineers who would like to transform ordinary arm bands into smart wearables to reduce deaths or major injuries brought by unattended accidental falls and crashes.  More importantly we desire to reduce road accidents and fatalities due to distracted driving around the world.

                                                    

Dr.  Giovanni Tapang has PhD in Physics and is a signal processing expert.  He is the current project leader of Versatile Instrumentation System for Science Education and Research (VISSER) which aims to address the critical need for science laboratories in the country.  He is co-founder of AGGIL Technologies, a data mining and predictive analytics company.

                                                      

Leslie de Velez is a mechanical engineer and tech entrepreneur.  He co-founded AGGIL Technologies, a data mining and predictive analytics company.  Previously, he was a senior supply chain manager of Personal Beauty & Household Care - Procter & Gamble.

                                                     

Clarissa A. Carasco is a licensed electronics and communications engineer. She is an expert in the fields of programming, wireless communications, and embedded systems. She has developed a microcontroller-based wireless accelerometer for kinematic analysis and presented to ASEAN Conference on Science and Technology in Indonesia.  She studied and researched Simulations of Rectangular Substrate Integrated Waveguide (SIW) Cavity Resonator Filter at ISM and X-Band.

                                                   

Jan Pierre P. Pizarro is a licensed electrical engineer. He is knowledgeable in the fields of programming, electrical machines, power system and embedded systems. He has developed a low-cost power quality meter with a PC-based analyser.  He co-developed a microcontroller-based wireless accelerometer for kinematic analysis.

                                                    

Jeff Perez is a product designer responsible for the GRVTY design and prototyping. He is team member of VISSER and responsible for the component design and manufacturing.
