story:
U-GYM PRO Deep Tissue Muscle Massager

Enhance Exercise Whenever Wherever

- Relax deeper layer of muscle instantly
- Enhance exercise and recovery efficiency
- Portable solution designed to use on the spot

 

U-GYM Pro Deep Layer Muscle Massager is a smart and portable accessory designed for active exercise enthusiasts to get professional and effective massage on the go. It can help resolve muscle stiffness and soreness for different types of sports to improve exercise performance, speed up muscle recovery and prevent potential sport injury.

Before exercise – Body warm up
Busy modern people understand the importance of exercise can help them keep figure and reduce stress from work. However, with their hectic working schedule, the warm-up before every exercise is often neglected. To do high intensity aerobic directly without warm-up may cause muscle tear, sprain or overuse. Now with U-GYM Pro, you can do the warm-ups on the way to GYM. It’s small and easy to carry around with you allowing users to relax stiff muscle before doing heavy workout. Making every fractured time counts to avoid any possible sport injury.

During exercise – Enhance or assist training
When developing or training certain area of muscles, you can use U-GYM Pro to train other areas at the same time for better workout efficiency. For example, you can use U-GYM Pro to train abdomen area while doing speed walking to enhance exercise efficiency. This can not only do abs while walking but also force you to use abdomen muscle to lift legs and reduce possible injuries of thigh and kneel.

After exercise – Relax muscle and metalize chemical
To speed up muscle recovery and avoid soreness caused by chemical developing in muscle after an intensive and exhausting exercise, you can use U-GYM Pro to massage focusing on certain areas of muscle to help chemical metabolized and reduce discomfort from muscle soreness.

No time to exercise?
Sometimes life is just way ahead and we can hardly catch up to spare 30 minutes for exercise. However, U-GYM Pro can be a good substitute to passively massage and exercise your muscle to help consume calories, enhance or keep muscle strength. Embedded 3200mA Lithium Polymer battery can use up to 10 hours with one single charge, allowing users to utilize fractured time while walking, commuting or taking break to relax muscle on the spot, keep the good exercise habit going.

 

Testimonials

Trevor Owens: "The quality of the product is very high, not like the cheap ones you see in most stores. U-GYM is very close to the quality of the device you use at a chiropractor or physical therapist's office."

Charles Huang: "I loaned your U-GYM unit to a friend who hurt his back playing golf. He tried it and raves about it. Just thought you’d like to hear."

 

TechCrunch Review

 

As seen on

TechCrunch Interview Video
 

Megan Rose Dickey @TechCrunch: "I was able to try out the U-Gym muscle massager, and it was pretty cool."

Lester Victor Marks @AppleInsider: "The U-Gym product works well, and compares favorably with TENS units that cost almost five times as much.", "On the whole, it gives a new user what they need: places to put the electrodes, and advice about which program of pulsations might be used for. Score: 4.5 out of 5"

Marcus Chavers @NewsLedge: "Number one reason? No massage therapist visits. For those of us not down with a stranger giving us a massage, that’s a huge plus. It also mimics the benefits of expensive and time-consuming treatments like cupping and acupuncture."

Mahit Huilgol @TechPP: "Deep tissue massage is a messaging technique that focusses on realigning the layers of muscles and is often used for destressing and providing relief for muscle pain."

Tyler Lee @ubergizmo: "U-GYM Mini uses medium frequencies for its massages, unlike other TENS devices that operate below 1kHz.", "It is so small and easy to use, you could wear it under your clothes and no one would be the wiser. You could even get a massage while at work and your co-workers probably wouldn’t even know."

 

U-Gym APP

U-Gym, simply put, is an professional muscle stimulator but smarter and more advanced. Our team uses the latest technology to make the professional and medical grade device in a portable size. Besides, connecting the Smartphone U-Gym APP with bluetooth can let you choose freely your preferred stimulation programs and manage your usage data and health progress quite conveniently.

 

 

Furthermore, you can also take pictures of your progress and share them with friends on social media for a friendly competition. The embedded Gyro and G-sensor can capture your activities and sync them to with the smartphone to show the level of calories consumption. In addition, you can choose to login your account by entering your ID & PW, Facebook account or even by using AirSig Authentication (Signing words in the air by waving the phone like a wand).

One more interesting point is that so long as you have got proper clothes on,you can let U-Gym offer its good services to virtually any part of your body without being noticed.

PERKS

 

Where can I use U-Gym?  

 

You can use U-Gym whenever and wherever you like. You can use it to increase your workout intensity or burn more calories; you can enjoy it while watching TV or toning your abs or taking care of your loved ones; you can tone your body with U-Gym while working on computers; you can even use it to relax yourself while taking a long flight or even attending a tiresome meeting.The list can go on and on.

 

U-Gym's Key Features

With its neat and simple design, U-Gym uses various LED flashing patterns to indicate battery level, stimulation mode and power intensity. 
 

In the mobile and IoT era, we need to manage our health in a systematic and efficient way. With embedded Gyro and G-sensor, U-Gym records your exercise activity and upload to the smartphones through bluetooth to check your progress conveniently.

 

U-GYM Specs

>>U-GYM PRO with BLE

- LED indicator for status and intensity

- Auto timer 

- Water repellent

- Rechargeable battery up to 10 hours of use

- Medium stimulation frequecy (4000~8000Hz)

- Bluetooth (BLE)

>>U-GYM APP

- Weight management

- Goal setting

- U-GYM PRO control

- AirSig and Facebook login

- Status and massage mode sharing

- Customizing personal massage

- Massage modes download

U-Gym has distinct built-in features such as Workout Tracking, Status Sharing, Exercise Report, Goal Setting and so forth. Smart APP which is available on both iOS and Android systems can help you manage your health seamlessly and efficiently.

 

More Innovations

With embedded Lithium Polymer rechargeable battery UGYM Pro can continuously operate for up to 8 hours with one charge and can be used as a power bank.

How does U-Gym work?

 

 

Unlike most portable electrotherapy devices operating below 1,000Hz with single waveform, U-Gym can operate in a wide range of frequencies and multiple waveforms concurrently. With advanced hardware design and chip integration, our device can operate multiple interferential waveforms from TENS, FES, EMS and even METS with frequency up to 10,000Hz.

U-Gym uses electric current to stimulate the nerves, causing muscles to contract and induce the effect of passive workout accordingly, which can, in turn, help improve blood circulation and manage weight by consuming calories more efficiently.

 

 

Story Behind U-Gym

When U-Gym founder and CEO Mark received hospital rehabilitation for a shoulder injury three years ago, he discovered that professional electrotherapy is painless and very effective. However, it’s time consuming for going back and forth and inconvenient for making appointments. For that reason, Mark started to study middle frequency stimulation and possibly design a portable device. 

Besides, while developing middle frequency electrotherapy, chief executive of technology CC had to try different stimulation types and therapy modes personally and he unexpectedly lost 12.3 lbs in two months. As a result, we found out electrotherapy can be helpful not only in treating pain or illness but also in managing weight effectively. 

 

 
What PERKs can you get?

 

U-GYM uses many latest and advanced IC components and parts, and we need to buy them in volume to bring down the cost. We need your support to make U-Gym available and affordable to help more people get healthier and improve their lives.

The money will go to injection molding, PCB boards, LED components, production equipment and other customized parts. If we can raise adequate funds,we also plan to keep developing better stimulation programs for upgrading the quality of U-Gym as a whole.

Furthermore, we need to allot a portion of the funds to be raised for acquiring certifications from country to country and providing safe and regulated products. In addition, we are working with hospitals, retirement homes and gyms to get direct users feedback to help us perfect our products in the future.

To express our gratitude for your kind support, we will be pleased to provide you with our first generation products of U-Gym as perks. As we are working on the finishing touch for our products and stimulation programs, your constructive comments and suggestions will be deeply appreciated. 

 

Team Members' Profile

Mark Yu

Founder / CEO

Master of CS from New York University. Co-founder/CMO of AirSig, Inc. and founder of CARWAii.com. An innovative serial entrepreneur and active mentor for young startups. Mark has over 15 years of sales and marketing experience specifically in Semiconductor and Biotech Industries.

 

CC Hsu

Cofounder / CTO

BS of Electrical Engineering from China University of Science and Technology. Over 20 years of experience in Research Development & Application Engineering for consumer electronics. Main focus including digital electric circuit design, single chip program design, chip process and production management.

 

Aki Hsu

Cofounder / COO

BS of Commercial Design from Ming Chuan University. Over 20 years of experience in Graphic Design, Packaging Design, Corporate Identity System (CIS), Web Design, App Structuring and Marketing. Founder & Creative Director of AkiDesign Studio.

 

Marty Lo

APP Developer

MBA in Marketing, Lubin School of Business, Pace Univ. Founder & CEO of Inforton Technology Co., Ltd. Over 10 years of product marketing and project management experience in wireless & semiconductor Industries. Started involving health-related apps development since 2009 in both iOS & Android operating system.

 

Oren Hsu

Mechanical Engineer

BS of Mechanical Engineering from Lunghwa University of Science and Technology in Taiwan. Over 15 years of experience in exterior and mechanical design for innovative products. Special interests in consumer products and medical devices.

 

Professional Advisors

 

Dr. Chin-Yin Tsai
Medical Advisor

MD of School of Rehabilitation Medicine from Chung Shan Medical University. Bachelor of Chinese Medicine from China Medical University. Founder of Northern Taiwan Chinese Weight-Management Association. President of Chihui Jingxi Traditional Chinese Medicine clinics. Attending physician of both Chihui and Junyue Chinese Medicine Clinics.

 

Dr. Abel Po-Hao Huang
Clinical Advisor

MD Biodesign fellow at Stanford Health Care, PhD of Institute of Clinical Medicine from National Taiwan University. Attending Neurosurgeon & Assistant Professor at Department of Neurological Surgery, National Taiwan University Hospital. Y Combinator alumni (W15). Neurosurgeon and Medical entrepreneur.

 

The Impact

 

We strongly believe U-Gym (Smart Mobile Health Enhancer) campaign can help many people enhance their health with less effort. U-Gym can help people save not only much time but lots of money.As a very practical and convenient health-enhancing device, it will undoubtedly make a very positive impact on modern people’s lives in the hustling and bustling world.

Therefore, your support to this campaign is definitely significant because your contribution will make it possible for U-Gym to become available and affordable for the young and the old alike in the near future.

 

Risks & Challenges

Our team members including CC, Marty, CM and me all have had many years of experience in electronic and semiconductor industries in Taiwan. Since Taiwan is famous for being able to make such superb products as Apple’s iPhone, we believe it is an ideal base for us to undertake the U-Gym project.

 

INJECTION MOLDING

For the purpose of making perfect parts, we have decided to produce our parts by means of injection molding. There is typically a 60-day lead time to fabricate the molds and every fine adjustment after each mold test run will extend additional two weeks. This is where the delays may occur and could possibly spin out of control. That is why we put our own money in molding before the campaign starts to minimize more variation of delays.

SUPPLY CHAIN AND LOGISTICS
In order to minimize the possible delay of certain key components such as Lithium Polymer battery, we have adjusted our design so as to fit four different sizes of batteries from four different manufacturers.

For some custom made parts like converter, due to long lead time and the need for larger quantity, we have started the ordering process for the estimated quantity by putting in our own money before the campaign commenced. This will minimize the possible delay if anything goes wrong.

For other common parts, we have also started the Quality Assurance procedure by making test equipment to examine incoming components and sub-assembled module. Without letting our manufacturer tell us what's good or bad, we have years of experience in developing and producing consumer electronics (eg. laptop, mini servers and communication modules). So we know what we are doing and are confident in dealing with whatever possible risks throughout the manufacturing process.

 

 

 

Certification

 

In order to deliver U-Gym, certain certifications in the respective markets are required. Thus we have started to prepare documents and samples and work closely with the consulting company specializing in international certification procedures for medical appliances.

The manufacturers we employ in Taiwan are GMP (Good Manufacturing Practice) certified and they have experience in manufacturing medical devices, particularly muscle stimulator. Besides, we will have FCC and CE certificates ready for bluetooth connectivity before the delivery.

Although we are confident and well prepared to handle all the respective processes, we cannot eliminate the risk of possible delays due to compliance issues. If we should encounter any unexpected problems, we will try our best to fulfill your order.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Do you like our project? If you think our project can make a difference to the world or simply, your family, friends and people you think may need it. Please don’t hesitate to share our project with them. We need all the help and support we can get. Even just give us a quick feedback from you will help us in a big way! 

Share our campaign directly: http://igg.me/at/myugym

 

Safety and Precaution

U-Gym is suitable for use by all adults. However, as with all forms of exercise, some care is needed when using them, so please bear in mind the points below and do not use U-Gym if:

·  You have an electronic implant (eg. cardiac pacemaker) or suffer from other heart problem.

·  You are pregnant.

·  You suffer from cancer, epilepsy or are under medical supervision for cognitive dysfunction.

·  You are connected to high-frequency surgical equipment.

·  There are a number of illness not suitable to use U-Gym. Please consult with physician if you are not certain about your condition.

·  Remember to seek professional advice if you feel uncertain in any way after using U-Gym. It's always good to let your doctor know your progress at home.

 

FAQs

 

Q1. Your product is categorized as medical device, so do you have any compliance and qualification?

 

A1. We understand your concern. Basically our product is designed on the basis of a professional electrotherapy device and we will implement all safety measures and protections in case of any mis-operation. In addition, we plan to apply to major countries for FDA compliance and other necessary certifications once we have more prototype on hand. We have consulted with Emergo Group who is specialized in helping companies to get approved. That is why we need to raise a fund on Indiegogo to build more products and cover the expense of multiple applications. 

 

Q2. I’m trying to compare the difference between your U-Gym and other portable TENS or EMS machines. Does the U-Gym stimulate muscle in a way that other similar equipment does not? What is the reason is the price much lower in Taiwan?

 

A2. The most differences between U-GYM and other portable machines are the operating frequency, multiple interferential waveforms and stimulation intensity. Most machines out there still focus on one or two indications but we aim to make U-GYM a multi-purpose device by making it “user programmable”.

People utilize electrotherapy technology for decades, consequently there are many different types of devices on the market. In addition, Taiwan is home of OEM and ODM manufacturers for many name-brand electro-stimulator companies, such as Antelope Suit, Slendertone, OSIM and Omron. For those reasons, the devices are seemly cheaper in Taiwan and China. However, there are not much improvement in design and functionality albeit many years of evolvement, and most portable stimulation devices still look similar and have limited functions. 

U-GYM uses the latest technology and advanced components to make it effective, portable and programmable. We even have to customized and design our own components to match our designs. Thus the cost for producing U-GYM is much higher than we expected. We hope you will enjoy the benefits U-GYM brings you and we look forward to more feedbacks.
story_txt:
U-GYM PRO Deep Tissue Muscle Massager
Enhance Exercise Whenever Wherever

- Relax deeper layer of muscle instantly- Enhance exercise and recovery efficiency- Portable solution designed to use on the spot
 
U-GYM Pro Deep Layer Muscle Massager is a smart and portable accessory designed for active exercise enthusiasts to get professional and effective massage on the go. It can help resolve muscle stiffness and soreness for different types of sports to improve exercise performance, speed up muscle recovery and prevent potential sport injury.
Before exercise – Body warm upBusy modern people understand the importance of exercise can help them keep figure and reduce stress from work. However, with their hectic working schedule, the warm-up before every exercise is often neglected. To do high intensity aerobic directly without warm-up may cause muscle tear, sprain or overuse. Now with U-GYM Pro, you can do the warm-ups on the way to GYM. It’s small and easy to carry around with you allowing users to relax stiff muscle before doing heavy workout. Making every fractured time counts to avoid any possible sport injury.
During exercise – Enhance or assist trainingWhen developing or training certain area of muscles, you can use U-GYM Pro to train other areas at the same time for better workout efficiency. For example, you can use U-GYM Pro to train abdomen area while doing speed walking to enhance exercise efficiency. This can not only do abs while walking but also force you to use abdomen muscle to lift legs and reduce possible injuries of thigh and kneel.
After exercise – Relax muscle and metalize chemicalTo speed up muscle recovery and avoid soreness caused by chemical developing in muscle after an intensive and exhausting exercise, you can use U-GYM Pro to massage focusing on certain areas of muscle to help chemical metabolized and reduce discomfort from muscle soreness.
No time to exercise?Sometimes life is just way ahead and we can hardly catch up to spare 30 minutes for exercise. However, U-GYM Pro can be a good substitute to passively massage and exercise your muscle to help consume calories, enhance or keep muscle strength. Embedded 3200mA Lithium Polymer battery can use up to 10 hours with one single charge, allowing users to utilize fractured time while walking, commuting or taking break to relax muscle on the spot, keep the good exercise habit going.

 
Testimonials

Trevor Owens: "The quality of the product is very high, not like the cheap ones you see in most stores. U-GYM is very close to the quality of the device you use at a chiropractor or physical therapist's office."

Charles Huang: "I loaned your U-GYM unit to a friend who hurt his back playing golf. He tried it and raves about it. Just thought you’d like to hear."
 

TechCrunch Review

 
As seen onTechCrunch Interview Video 
Megan Rose Dickey @TechCrunch: "I was able to try out the U-Gym muscle massager, and it was pretty cool."
Lester Victor Marks @AppleInsider: "The U-Gym product works well, and compares favorably with TENS units that cost almost five times as much.", "On the whole, it gives a new user what they need: places to put the electrodes, and advice about which program of pulsations might be used for. Score: 4.5 out of 5"
Marcus Chavers @NewsLedge: "Number one reason? No massage therapist visits. For those of us not down with a stranger giving us a massage, that’s a huge plus. It also mimics the benefits of expensive and time-consuming treatments like cupping and acupuncture."
Mahit Huilgol @TechPP: "Deep tissue massage is a messaging technique that focusses on realigning the layers of muscles and is often used for destressing and providing relief for muscle pain."
Tyler Lee @ubergizmo: "U-GYM Mini uses medium frequencies for its massages, unlike other TENS devices that operate below 1kHz.", "It is so small and easy to use, you could wear it under your clothes and no one would be the wiser. You could even get a massage while at work and your co-workers probably wouldn’t even know."

 U-Gym APPU-Gym, simply put, is an professional muscle stimulator but smarter and more advanced. Our team uses the latest technology to make the professional and medical grade device in a portable size. Besides, connecting the Smartphone U-Gym APP with bluetooth can let you choose freely your preferred stimulation programs and manage your usage data and health progress quite conveniently.  Furthermore, you can also take pictures of your progress and share them with friends on social media for a friendly competition. The embedded Gyro and G-sensor can capture your activities and sync them to with the smartphone to show the level of calories consumption. In addition, you can choose to login your account by entering your ID & PW, Facebook account or even by using AirSig Authentication (Signing words in the air by waving the phone like a wand).One more interesting point is that so long as you have got proper clothes on,you can let U-Gym offer its good services to virtually any part of your body without being noticed.PERKS Where can I use U-Gym?   You can use U-Gym whenever and wherever you like. You can use it to increase your workout intensity or burn more calories; you can enjoy it while watching TV or toning your abs or taking care of your loved ones; you can tone your body with U-Gym while working on computers; you can even use it to relax yourself while taking a long flight or even attending a tiresome meeting.The list can go on and on. U-Gym's Key Features
With its neat and simple design, U-Gym uses various LED flashing patterns to indicate battery level, stimulation mode and power intensity.  

In the mobile and IoT era, we need to manage our health in a systematic and efficient way. With embedded Gyro and G-sensor, U-Gym records your exercise activity and upload to the smartphones through bluetooth to check your progress conveniently.
 
U-GYM Specs
>>U-GYM PRO with BLE
- LED indicator for status and intensity
- Auto timer 
- Water repellent
- Rechargeable battery up to 10 hours of use
- Medium stimulation frequecy (4000~8000Hz)
- Bluetooth (BLE)
>>U-GYM APP
- Weight management
- Goal setting
- U-GYM PRO control
- AirSig and Facebook login
- Status and massage mode sharing
- Customizing personal massage
- Massage modes download
U-Gym has distinct built-in features such as Workout Tracking, Status Sharing, Exercise Report, Goal Setting and so forth. Smart APP which is available on both iOS and Android systems can help you manage your health seamlessly and efficiently.
 
More Innovations
With embedded Lithium Polymer rechargeable battery UGYM Pro can continuously operate for up to 8 hours with one charge and can be used as a power bank.

How does U-Gym work?
 

 
Unlike most portable electrotherapy devices operating below 1,000Hz with single waveform, U-Gym can operate in a wide range of frequencies and multiple waveforms concurrently. With advanced hardware design and chip integration, our device can operate multiple interferential waveforms from TENS, FES, EMS and even METS with frequency up to 10,000Hz.
U-Gym uses electric current to stimulate the nerves, causing muscles to contract and induce the effect of passive workout accordingly, which can, in turn, help improve blood circulation and manage weight by consuming calories more efficiently. 

 
Story Behind U-Gym

When U-Gym founder and CEO Mark received hospital rehabilitation for a shoulder injury three years ago, he discovered that professional electrotherapy is painless and very effective. However, it’s time consuming for going back and forth and inconvenient for making appointments. For that reason, Mark started to study middle frequency stimulation and possibly design a portable device. 
Besides, while developing middle frequency electrotherapy, chief executive of technology CC had to try different stimulation types and therapy modes personally and he unexpectedly lost 12.3 lbs in two months. As a result, we found out electrotherapy can be helpful not only in treating pain or illness but also in managing weight effectively. 
 
 
What PERKs can you get?

 
U-GYM uses many latest and advanced IC components and parts, and we need to buy them in volume to bring down the cost. We need your support to make U-Gym available and affordable to help more people get healthier and improve their lives.
The money will go to injection molding, PCB boards, LED components, production equipment and other customized parts. If we can raise adequate funds,we also plan to keep developing better stimulation programs for upgrading the quality of U-Gym as a whole.
Furthermore, we need to allot a portion of the funds to be raised for acquiring certifications from country to country and providing safe and regulated products. In addition, we are working with hospitals, retirement homes and gyms to get direct users feedback to help us perfect our products in the future.
To express our gratitude for your kind support, we will be pleased to provide you with our first generation products of U-Gym as perks. As we are working on the finishing touch for our products and stimulation programs, your constructive comments and suggestions will be deeply appreciated. 
 
Team Members' Profile


Mark YuFounder / CEO
Master of CS from New York University. Co-founder/CMO of AirSig, Inc. and founder of CARWAii.com. An innovative serial entrepreneur and active mentor for young startups. Mark has over 15 years of sales and marketing experience specifically in Semiconductor and Biotech Industries.
 
 CC HsuCofounder / CTO
BS of Electrical Engineering from China University of Science and Technology. Over 20 years of experience in Research Development & Application Engineering for consumer electronics. Main focus including digital electric circuit design, single chip program design, chip process and production management.
 
 Aki HsuCofounder / COO
BS of Commercial Design from Ming Chuan University. Over 20 years of experience in Graphic Design, Packaging Design, Corporate Identity System (CIS), Web Design, App Structuring and Marketing. Founder & Creative Director of AkiDesign Studio.
 
 Marty LoAPP Developer
MBA in Marketing, Lubin School of Business, Pace Univ. Founder & CEO of Inforton Technology Co., Ltd. Over 10 years of product marketing and project management experience in wireless & semiconductor Industries. Started involving health-related apps development since 2009 in both iOS & Android operating system.
 
 Oren HsuMechanical Engineer
BS of Mechanical Engineering from Lunghwa University of Science and Technology in Taiwan. Over 15 years of experience in exterior and mechanical design for innovative products. Special interests in consumer products and medical devices.
 
Professional Advisors
 
 Dr. Chin-Yin TsaiMedical AdvisorMD of School of Rehabilitation Medicine from Chung Shan Medical University. Bachelor of Chinese Medicine from China Medical University. Founder of Northern Taiwan Chinese Weight-Management Association. President of Chihui Jingxi Traditional Chinese Medicine clinics. Attending physician of both Chihui and Junyue Chinese Medicine Clinics.
 
 Dr. Abel Po-Hao Huang

Clinical Advisor

MD Biodesign fellow at Stanford Health Care, PhD of Institute of Clinical Medicine from National Taiwan University. Attending Neurosurgeon & Assistant Professor at Department of Neurological Surgery, National Taiwan University Hospital. Y Combinator alumni (W15). Neurosurgeon and Medical entrepreneur.
 
The Impact
 
We strongly believe U-Gym (Smart Mobile Health Enhancer) campaign can help many people enhance their health with less effort. U-Gym can help people save not only much time but lots of money.As a very practical and convenient health-enhancing device, it will undoubtedly make a very positive impact on modern people’s lives in the hustling and bustling world.
Therefore, your support to this campaign is definitely significant because your contribution will make it possible for U-Gym to become available and affordable for the young and the old alike in the near future.
 
Risks & Challenges
Our team members including CC, Marty, CM and me all have had many years of experience in electronic and semiconductor industries in Taiwan. Since Taiwan is famous for being able to make such superb products as Apple’s iPhone, we believe it is an ideal base for us to undertake the U-Gym project.
 
INJECTION MOLDING
For the purpose of making perfect parts, we have decided to produce our parts by means of injection molding. There is typically a 60-day lead time to fabricate the molds and every fine adjustment after each mold test run will extend additional two weeks. This is where the delays may occur and could possibly spin out of control. That is why we put our own money in molding before the campaign starts to minimize more variation of delays.
SUPPLY CHAIN AND LOGISTICSIn order to minimize the possible delay of certain key components such as Lithium Polymer battery, we have adjusted our design so as to fit four different sizes of batteries from four different manufacturers.
For some custom made parts like converter, due to long lead time and the need for larger quantity, we have started the ordering process for the estimated quantity by putting in our own money before the campaign commenced. This will minimize the possible delay if anything goes wrong.
For other common parts, we have also started the Quality Assurance procedure by making test equipment to examine incoming components and sub-assembled module. Without letting our manufacturer tell us what's good or bad, we have years of experience in developing and producing consumer electronics (eg. laptop, mini servers and communication modules). So we know what we are doing and are confident in dealing with whatever possible risks throughout the manufacturing process.
 
  
Certification
 
In order to deliver U-Gym, certain certifications in the respective markets are required. Thus we have started to prepare documents and samples and work closely with the consulting company specializing in international certification procedures for medical appliances.
The manufacturers we employ in Taiwan are GMP (Good Manufacturing Practice) certified and they have experience in manufacturing medical devices, particularly muscle stimulator. Besides, we will have FCC and CE certificates ready for bluetooth connectivity before the delivery.
Although we are confident and well prepared to handle all the respective processes, we cannot eliminate the risk of possible delays due to compliance issues. If we should encounter any unexpected problems, we will try our best to fulfill your order.
 
Other Ways You Can Help
Do you like our project? If you think our project can make a difference to the world or simply, your family, friends and people you think may need it. Please don’t hesitate to share our project with them. We need all the help and support we can get. Even just give us a quick feedback from you will help us in a big way! 
Share our campaign directly: http://igg.me/at/myugym

U-Gym is suitable for use by all adults. However, as with all forms of exercise, some care is needed when using them, so please bear in mind the points below and do not use U-Gym if:
·  You have an electronic implant (eg. cardiac pacemaker) or suffer from other heart problem.
·  You are pregnant.
·  You suffer from cancer, epilepsy or are under medical supervision for cognitive dysfunction.
·  You are connected to high-frequency surgical equipment.
·  There are a number of illness not suitable to use U-Gym. Please consult with physician if you are not certain about your condition.
·  Remember to seek professional advice if you feel uncertain in any way after using U-Gym. It's always good to let your doctor know your progress at home.
 
FAQs
 
Q1. Your product is categorized as medical device, so do you have any compliance and qualification?
 
A1. We understand your concern. Basically our product is designed on the basis of a professional electrotherapy device and we will implement all safety measures and protections in case of any mis-operation. In addition, we plan to apply to major countries for FDA compliance and other necessary certifications once we have more prototype on hand. We have consulted with Emergo Group who is specialized in helping companies to get approved. That is why we need to raise a fund on Indiegogo to build more products and cover the expense of multiple applications. 
 
Q2. I’m trying to compare the difference between your U-Gym and other portable TENS or EMS machines. Does the U-Gym stimulate muscle in a way that other similar equipment does not? What is the reason is the price much lower in Taiwan?
 
A2. The most differences between U-GYM and other portable machines are the operating frequency, multiple interferential waveforms and stimulation intensity. Most machines out there still focus on one or two indications but we aim to make U-GYM a multi-purpose device by making it “user programmable”.
People utilize electrotherapy technology for decades, consequently there are many different types of devices on the market. In addition, Taiwan is home of OEM and ODM manufacturers for many name-brand electro-stimulator companies, such as Antelope Suit, Slendertone, OSIM and Omron. For those reasons, the devices are seemly cheaper in Taiwan and China. However, there are not much improvement in design and functionality albeit many years of evolvement, and most portable stimulation devices still look similar and have limited functions.

We always saw all around us and on ourself too, that something is wrong. When we wtihe something on the blackboard and we can´t transform this to the PC. It is possible to take a picture bud I don´t want to have it in form of photos.

We wanted to figure out something that can transform movement my pen to the PC and than save it in PDF. That would make possible so much better conference and goup conversation or calls, where you need to draw or wrote something to others. Table of content will be online transform to all user, tat will be on the phone. Teacher can record all, what he wrote on the blackboard. This will be a huge contribution for teaching math, because student will habe all solution example in PDF from teacher.


So, we started develping E-fix. It is fix, that will interconnect with PC and special program will be collect the movement your feather. You will choose four lateral points and according to them, the program is managed. When you start drawing or writening, program evaluates the position of pen and transform it to the monitor.



No more taking pictures of th blackboard or drawing pictures in painting programe. What you write, will be save in your PC. How simply! Using our feather, you can simply wipe the board off and continue. No dependent about kind or size your foundation. You can draw anything you want.


We need your support to finished E-fix, tune details and made trade dress.

The small STEMP™ temperature sensor is housed in a custom-designed, ultrasonically-welded plastic case (33mm long x 20mm wide x 6mm thick) that is safe for children and sized for their smaller bodies.

An integrated lithium polymer (LiPo) battery can be charged quickly (in 30 minutes) with the included USB dock, providing up to 30 days of usage on a single charge.

We are fortunate to have spent so much time on product development, supplier relationships, and manufacturing relationships prior to launching our Kickstarter campaign. We can’t mitigate all of the risks, but by waiting until this stage of development, we believe that we have minimized most of them. Of course, with any project like this, there are potential risks in final product development, supply procurement, manufacturing and assembly, and fulfillment.

Final product development: It is possible that there will need to be subtle changes to the hardware or adhesives driven by manufacturing requirements. We will continue to iterate on development and pre-production to minimize the impact of these changes. Of course, we believe that any changes will be in an effort to improve the final product, and we will keep our backers posted about any such changes. Considering the development work that has already been completed, we expect these to be minimal.

Supply procurement: As a small start-up, we recognize that our purchase volumes will be small, especially compared to other companies in other industries. To some extent, we will be operating based on constraints provided by these suppliers. However, we have been developing close relationships with our suppliers, all of whom are excited not just to supply us with parts but to partner with us in the creation of this innovative product. We expect that we will continue to be able to leverage these relationships to prevent any supply constraints from impacting the overall timeline, especially as our volumes increase.

Manufacturing and assembly: As with our suppliers, we have developed strong manufacturing and production relationships. These partners are committed to helping us deliver STEMP™ on time. If demand is greater than expected, this could impact the delivery timeline. We will stay in close communication with our manufacturing partners throughout the campaign to apprise them of updated forecasts, and of course we will communicate frequently with our backers, particularly if delays seem imminent.

Fulfillment: Again, if demand is greater than expected, this could impact the delivery timeline. We will strive to ensure that our fulfillment process and resources (both internal and external) are scaled up appropriately, based on response from the campaign.

story_txt:
STEMP Smart Temperature Patch™ is no longer available via InDemand. Please follow the campaign or join our email list if you are interested in learning more about progress with STEMP. We appreciate your support!



The award-winning STEMP Smart Temperature Patch™ is the thermometer reinvented for the 21st century. The STEMP sensor, medical-grade adhesives, and smartphone apps work together seamlessly to provide immediate, accurate, continuous body temperature measurement. Think of it as the thermometer meets the band-aid. If you have kids, if you have parents, if you have ever been sick, or if you want to manage your health better, this product is for you.Using STEMP™ is as easy as 1-2-3:
➊ Insert the rechargable STEMP™ temperature sensor into a disposable STEMP™ adhesive patch. If you’ve ever inserted tab A into slot B before, you will have no problem!
➋ Apply STEMP™ to your body — or to your child or loved one. Everyone knows how an adhesive bandage works!
➌ Get immediate temperature data on your iPhone. STEMP™ monitors body temperature continuously and wirelessly, for as long as you need it.






We’ve designed STEMP™ to solve the problems we as parents see with thermometers currently on the market:


Reliable temperature measurement: Provides accurate readings the first time and every time, so users never need to worry or re-measure

Continuous monitoring: Collect data, see trends, and make smarter decisions, over hours, days, or even weeks (one charge lasts up to 30 days)

“Wear it and forget it”: Never again must one get up in the middle of the night to wake up a child or loved one to take their temperature

Intelligent mobile app: Features smart alerts, data tracking and analysis, battery status, and an elegant, customizable interface (available now for iOS and Android, including Apple Watch and Android smartwatches)

Convenient form factor: Small size and comfortable, medical-grade adhesives make it easy to wear (including in the shower)

Affordable price: Cutting-edge home healthcare shouldn’t be expensive; STEMP is a high-value product competitive with everything on the market

 STEMP™ is designed for everyone in your family. And everyone in your life! STEMP can be used to monitor body temperature for a variety of applications:


The STEMP Smart Temperature Patch™ is the result of proprietary patent-pending technology. Our design conforms to FCC and CE regulations, among others. We have begun the FDA approval process, which will be concluded following completion of the hardware and software. STEMP™ is based on cutting-edge but proven technologies, integrated to create a seamless, easy-to-use experience for everyone:

We scoured the planet to find the most accurate and efficient temperature sensor available at this size, to make sure that each and every measurement is consistent. The STEMP™ temperature sensor is accurate to ±0.2°C and is factory-calibrated for years of continuous temperature readings.

BLE (sometimes called Bluetooth Smart) technology connects quickly and easily to a smartphone, managing wireless transmission throughout a typical home with little drain on the STEMP™ or phone battery.

The small STEMP™ temperature sensor is housed in a custom-designed, ultrasonically-welded plastic case (33mm long x 20mm wide x 6mm thick) that is safe for children and sized for their smaller bodies.


An integrated lithium polymer (LiPo) battery can be charged quickly (in 30 minutes) with the included USB dock, providing up to 30 days of usage on a single charge.





The STEMP™ sensor is factory-sealed to provide a waterproof unit that is safe for the shower.

We use medical-grade adhesive similar to that found in high-quality bandages — safe for children and sensitive skin, even when worn for hours or days (5–7 days is recommended).Additional adhesives will be available via getstemp.com and eventually via online and brick-and-mortar retail.
The STEMP™ app (available as a free download from the App Store) is designed to provide a simple, intuitive interface to the STEMP™ sensor. Our goal was to make the software as easy to use as a traditional thermometer, but with many additional benefits:The app connects to the STEMP™ sensor quickly and easily, providing immediate and continuous temperature data, without having to remember to take additional readings.

Interactive graphs make it easy to see trends and make smarter decisions. Temperature trends can be used to understand when one is getting sick, to manage health conditions, and to track ovulation cycles for women trying to conceive. The possibilities are endless!
Smart alerts can notify one or more phones if a temperature hits a certain threshold (high or low). Parents need never again wake up in the middle of the night to wake up their children just to take their temperatures. Instead, they can catch up on their rest, confident that their phone will alert them of any important changes.
STEMP™ works with iCloud to share temperature data among multiple iOS devices. That allows a parent, sibling, or caregiver to monitor temperature across town or around the world. Data can be exported to share with a healthcare professional or record in a spreadsheet.
One app can manage multiple STEMP™ sensors and multiple users, storing weeks or months of user data. One family can share a single sensor, “linking” it to a person as needed. Or that same family can have three or four sensors, each of them “assigned” to an individual for easy monitoring.


The STEMP™ app is available now for both iOS and Android, with Apple Watch and Android smartwatch connectivity. STEMP™ is already a showcase for newer iOS features, including Health, Today/Notification Center, and Suggested Apps.














STEMP™ is the product of three parents blessed with six children among us, as well as three loving wives who support our entrepreneurial dreams. We came together in 2013 to create a new kind of thermometer:
Zsolt Krajcsik has 25 years of experience in special effects/animation R&D and production, including leadership of a $7 million postproduction studio development, and is a recipient of a Visual Effects Society Award. A lifelong engineer, builder, and tinkerer, he is leading STEMP’s engineering and product development efforts. Originally from Hungary, Zsolt is based in Los Angeles, where he and his wife have a son who was the original inspiration for the STEMP Smart Temperature Patch™.
A father of three, Barnabas Gero has 15 years of experience in corporate finance, including equity fundraising, M&A, and project finance, including stints at Citibank and Deloitte. He has also been active in developing start-up businesses and film projects between his native Hungary and California. Barnabas received an MPhil Management from Columbia University; he also holds an MA Sociology from New School for Social Research and an MA Political Science from Central European University. Barnabas resides in the San Francisco Bay Area with his wife and three children.
David J. Whelan is a Los Angeles- and New York-based entrepreneur with 20+ years of experience developing and building companies as a strategy consultant, executive recruiter, and marketing and operations executive. He helped launch one of the first consumer-oriented wearables back in 2005, and he has been operating at the intersection of technology, health, and wellness ever since. Dave holds an MBA from UCLA Anderson School and a BS Symbolic Systems from Stanford University. He also attended Carnegie Mellon University and London Business School. He and his wife have a four-year-old son (“four-and-a-half,” as he would say), a nine-month-old daughter, and a crazy puggle, two of whom are featured in the crowdfunding video.
Each of us believes in leveraging simple technology to make our lives easier, and STEMP™ is the product of those efforts. We are well on the way to launching the STEMP Smart Temperature Patch™. Development of the initial hardware and software began in late 2013 and has gone through multiple rounds of testing, improvements, and retesting. Each iteration has reduced the size and complexity of the hardware, while improving its performance. We have been able to identify and integrate cutting-edge technology to create a product that does not compromise on quality, performance, or price.
We are fortunate to have spent so much time on product development, supplier relationships, and manufacturing relationships prior to launching our Kickstarter campaign. We can’t mitigate all of the risks, but by waiting until this stage of development, we believe that we have minimized most of them. Of course, with any project like this, there are potential risks in final product development, supply procurement, manufacturing and assembly, and fulfillment.
Final product development: It is possible that there will need to be subtle changes to the hardware or adhesives driven by manufacturing requirements. We will continue to iterate on development and pre-production to minimize the impact of these changes. Of course, we believe that any changes will be in an effort to improve the final product, and we will keep our backers posted about any such changes. Considering the development work that has already been completed, we expect these to be minimal.Supply procurement: As a small start-up, we recognize that our purchase volumes will be small, especially compared to other companies in other industries. To some extent, we will be operating based on constraints provided by these suppliers. However, we have been developing close relationships with our suppliers, all of whom are excited not just to supply us with parts but to partner with us in the creation of this innovative product. We expect that we will continue to be able to leverage these relationships to prevent any supply constraints from impacting the overall timeline, especially as our volumes increase.Manufacturing and assembly: As with our suppliers, we have developed strong manufacturing and production relationships. These partners are committed to helping us deliver STEMP™ on time. If demand is greater than expected, this could impact the delivery timeline. We will stay in close communication with our manufacturing partners throughout the campaign to apprise them of updated forecasts, and of course we will communicate frequently with our backers, particularly if delays seem imminent.Fulfillment: Again, if demand is greater than expected, this could impact the delivery timeline. We will strive to ensure that our fulfillment process and resources (both internal and external) are scaled up appropriately, based on response from the campaign.Dear Flickr, I’m Sick by Courtney Carmody is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.All other images © STEMP Inc. or their respective logo trademark owners.

story:
HOW DID WE BEGIN?

University of Wisconsin hockey standout Brittany Ammerman and former US soccer team captain and now ESPN analyst Julie Foudy,  have partnered to outfit seven underprivileged women’s soccer teams for the first time in Kenya.

Brittany Ammerman, a senior at the University of Wisconsin-Madison and aspiring surgeon, first visited Kenya in 2013 as a member of the nonprofit organization Health by Motorbike. Accompanied by 11 other UW students and founder of Health by Motorbike (and UW Professor) Araceli Alonso, the goal was community outreach in southeastern rural Kenya, with the aim to educate and share knowledge about health and women’s health, specifically.



While there, Brittany Ammerman-and the athlete inside of her-bought a soccer ball in the Kenyan city of Mombasa. Originally, the intention was to keep busy during downtime and entertain some of the children. Surprisingly, the women were the most interested in playing. After the month-long trip concluded, the women asked Professor Alonso if they could be provided the means for a soccer league to compete against one another.

Brittany saw an opportunity– women in many rural communities in Kenya are overlooked with little opportunity to learn a skill, earn for their families, and build the types of relationships and confidence that come from participating in sports. Soon emerged a subdivision of Health by Motorbike: the Nikumbuke Women’s Soccer League.

When she returned in 2014, Brittany introduced soccer to two villages. She was able to fundraise $2000 to provide customized jerseys for two village teams, for a total of 40 women. The money also allowed the women to receive shorts, shoes, and socks. 


On June 14th, 2014 the inaugural Nikumbuke Women’s Soccer League game was held between two of the villages, Mpakani (yellow) and Jirani (light blue). Hundreds of villagers, especially women, watched the game. (The captain of Jirani Village, Esther, makes $15 per month- she used $5 to hire a coach for her team). Following the game, from seeing the joy in the women who were competing and the fun in competition, the remaining villages that Health by Motorbike communicates with asked to join the league and be provided the means to field teams. 

THIS IS WHERE YOU COME IN:

Nikumbuke is a Swahili term meaning,  “Remember Me”. This holiday season YOU can be remembered for making a difference.

Julie Foudy and Brittany Ammerman invite YOU to help make a difference. By contributing to raising our goal of $10,000 you can change a woman’s life, a village’s life, even an entire community’s life.

WHAT WE NEED:

Let’s break it down:

-We need AT LEAST $10,000 to fund all 7 teams with the BASICS.

-PER ONE PLAYER:

  -To provide the BASICS (jersey, soccer ball, cleats, socks, and shorts) to one player = $72

-We need AT LEAST $15,000 to fund all 7 teams with the BASICS+ MORE

  -To provide the BASICS+ (the BASICS plus soccer bag, shin guards, and improved field conditions) to one player = $108

DONATE THE FOLLOWING AMOUNTS TO PROVIDE THE CORRESPONDING EQUIPMENT:

    BASICS:

  -Jersey: $24

  -Cleats: $19

  -Socks: $9 

  -Shorts: $14

  -Ball: $6

  -Completely fund 1 player BASICS: $72

BASICS+:

-Jersey: $24

  -Cleats: $19

  -Socks: $9 

  -Shorts: $14

  -Ball: $6

                 =$72

        PLUS:

  -Soccer Bag: $20

  -Shin Guards: $9

  -Improved Field Conditions: $7

                  =$36

BASICS $72 + $36 = $108 for BASICS+ 

      -Completely fund 1 player BASICS+: $108

Donate $130, and provide the BASICS+ gear for one woman AND receive a custom Nikumbuke Jersey for yourself. 


OTHER WAYS TO HELP:
REMINDER: small donations contribute to BIG CHANGES! 
Can't donate much? Remember that YOU can be remembered for giving women the opportunity to play, no matter how small the contribution. Donate just $6, and you provide one ball to one woman. Brittany Ammerman provided one ball and it helped change the world for these women. Donate $9, and you provide socks or shin guards for one woman. Little donations can be the difference and allow YOU to be REMEMBERED!
SHARE THIS CAMPAIGN! Tweet this! Facebook this! Email this! Instagram this! Do it all, SPREAD THE WORD! BE REMEMBERED

story:
At Harmony Yoga Center in Duncan, we like to dream big! HYC started out 7 years ago when our founder, Deborah Carruthers, began teaching students in her basement. Over the last 3 years in our present location, we've grown a warm and nurturing community where people can transform, heal and connect with others, but now we've outgrown our space and our dream to be of greater service to our community.

Our vision is to grow into the Harmony Yoga and Wellness Center. We want to offer a larger, accessible space that can accommodate people who face financial, physical and mental health barriers to accessing yoga, wellness programs, counselling and holistic health care. We want to be able to offer reduced cost or free services to those in need. We want to partner with more community organizations to provide services and a healing space to support their clients. And we want to overcome isolation by offering a supportive, healing space where people can gather and connect to improve individual and community health.


Why We Need to Grow

We currently rent a second-floor location with stair access, and limited opening hours, space and facilities. At HYC, we know this has been a great barrier to accessing yoga and wellness services for many people dealing with physical, mental and financial challenges. We need to be as accessible as possible to our community! After searching for the prime location, we've found it - alongside the vibrant Cowichan Green Community and Cycle Therapy Bikes. Our new location will open many doors, with its level-entry access and a greater class capacity that allows us to grow our community and reduce our prices.

At HYC, we aspire to help raise each other up, and work towards a future where members of our community are empowered to care for themselves and each other. Together we can create a strong community that works toward common goals. When individuals reach their full potential, and discover their true nature of contentment and happiness, they can share that strength with other members of the community. Our present location is a barrier to that future. Together, we can make our vision a reality.


What We Need & What You Get

With your support, we will be able to pay for the extensive renovations required to transform our new location into a modern yoga studio. We will be able to extend our reception hours to ensure we reach more people in the community. We'll have a studio with more floor space, a second break-out studio, change rooms with cubicles, a shower and bathroom stalls, and 5 professional offices to accommodate our dedicated holistic practitioners and counsellors. We will be able to offer more community programs including yoga, meditation, wellness, counselling, nutrition and more.

Generous contributions will enable us to support people who face financial and other barriers to accessing wellness services, and make it possible for us better serve and grow our community.

We have many perks that we hope will excite and motivate you on your healing journey, or help someone in our community to start theirs! Our perks include yoga passes, private yoga classes, HYC clothing, beautiful silk scarves and embroidered bags made in India, and more! You can use claim them for yourself, give them to someone special (we'll provide a gift certificate), or donate them to a community member in need.


Risks & Challenges

The challenges we face are the normal ups and downs of a small business. Expanding a small business means incurring considerable debt. Outgrowing our current space motivated us to find and commit to a new studio space that will suit our needs now and in the future. This expansion means a significant personal financial commitment for our founder, Deborah, and her partner.

With your generous contribution, we can offset part of the overall cost of expansion, allowing us to focus on delivering high-quality yoga and wellness programs to our community in the Cowichan Valley.


Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute financially? No problem! We have lots of ways for you to get involved in our growing community!

  • Tell your friends on social media by using the share buttons on our campaign.
  • Like and share our posts on Facebook - remember you will be helping people in need in our community, and that will benefit our community as a whole!
  • Give information about us to someone who you think may benefit. Even if you're not local, you can help us to spread the yoga word!
  • If you're a Cowichan Valley local and would like to volunteer, contact us at HYC (visit our website www.harmonyyogaduncan.com for more information) and we'll put you to work!

Thank you very much for your time and consideration,

Deborah Carruthers (HYC Founder) & Mara Cain (HYC Manager)

story:
Why I want to help? 

Over 3 years ago I found out about the opportunity to donate hair to children who have lost theirs for many different reasons. At the time I had just cut my hair that was 9 inches long. When I learned of this opportunity I was just 1 inch short of being able to donate. One week after I cut those 9 inches of hair off, I decided to grow my hair back out and donate it to Locks of Love that gives children the confidence they need with a new head of hair. 

If my goal of $1,000 is met I am going to cut my hair and donate it to Locks of Love as soon as the goal is met!!! Let's see if we can hit the goal before the timeline is up. Those who donate will be the only individuals to see the before and after photos of myself with long and short hair! Donate just $1 to receive those photos!

Let's not stop at $1,000!!

The reasons I want to raise money in addition to donating my hair:

  • I want my friends and family involved in a cause that I am consistently growing a deeper passion for. 
  • I love hair and I want children to have the same confidence as others do who enjoy a full head of hair. 
  • Each donation will help children associated with Locks of Love and Primary Children's Hospital.

What We Need & What You Get

Breakdown of where your donation will go: 

  • Your money donations will be sent to the Primary Children's Hospital.
  • 100% of proceeds will be donated!
  • If you want to team up with me and donate your hair, please contact me. 

The Impact

Here is a short description of the Primary Children's Hospital.

All donations and contributions to the hospital are made to Primary Children’s Hospital Foundation, a separately incorporated public charity under IRS Code 501(c)(3).  Our foundation supports the hospital’s mission of providing the highest level of pediatric care in an atmosphere of love and concern.

The foundation relies on the generous support of the community to raise funds and donate to the hospital.  These donations are used to help children and families at the hospital through:

  • Charity care
  • Supporting medical research
  • Bereavement therapy 
  • Music therapy
  • Art therapy
  • Toys for the hospital playroom


Other Ways You Can Help

Children need confidence, hope, friends, leaders, and mentors. We cannot be that for each child who has cancer. Together we can help boost those things through others. I have a goal of reaching $1,000. I cannot raise that on my own. Here are a couple options to me out:

  • Please share this page or link with your friends and family.
  • If you're not on social media use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Don’t be just another face in the crowd. Tushi Pal is the only fitness tracker to combine dedicated and intricate designs with innovative and potentially life-saving technology. Tushi Pal is the only wearable in the world to give you this level of technology, innovation and uniqueness in one.

 

 

 

 

With Tushi Pal, you can turn intentions into actions.

Like any good fitness tracker, Tushi Pal has the ability to expertly track your movements throughout the day. From leisurely walking to hardcore workouts, Tushi Pal has your back with accurate data available at your fingertips. 

                                                      Tushi Pal APP Compatible with

 

When you set Tushi Pal to the Heart Rate Mode and do any type of activity, like, walking, running, workouts, weight lifting, trekking etc… It will let you know in what stage you are in like, warming up, fat burning, doing aerobic, anaerobic and strenuous exercise by activating the “Breathing Light” in different colors, as seen above.

 

When it comes to your heart health, you don’t want to leave anything up to chance. It doesn’t matter if you’re a marathon runner, a mom on the go or have a serious health condition- it is always important to keep track of your heart rate throughout the day to help prevent potentially serious or life-threatening conditions.

Tushi Pal checks in on your heart rate automatically every 15 to 60 minutes using Tushi Pal’s 24-hour, real-time heart rate monitor.

When you're working out, the heart rate “sweet spot” is known as the "target zone”, which is about 60 to 80 percent of your maximum heart rate. With Tushi Pal, you can easily get the details of your heart without sacrificing your work by long-pressing the touch button.

Every Tushi Pal comes with a one-of-a-kind woven case that is handcrafted by skilled Mayan artisans. Taller Maya works in collaboration with the World Fair Trade Organization to hire these skilled individuals. 

Each case will be labeled with the artisans signature, which will make them unique. By purchasing a Tushi Pal, not only are you getting a high-quality, accurate tracker, but you’re helping provide jobs to those in need.

To learn more about this organization and how they are helping indigenous communities, please take a look at the bottom of our campaign page.

The handmade cases come in three different techniques: Jipi Japa, Sisal back strap loom or waist loom and Sisal Corchado. 

Your tracker’s strap will come with a dedicated, intricate design that will make you stand out in the crowd. To start, Tushi Pal will come in a beautifully designed blue, each with their own traditional designs. We want to introduce more colors as stretch goals so keep an eye out for when we hit various milestones!

In today’s day and age, we are always connected to our phones. Whether we need to be alerted on the score of a football game or are waiting for an important call, Tushi Pal has your back.

 

 

                                              Tushi Pal APP Compatible with

 

 

Learn more about our adventures in helping indigenous communities find jobs. Upon a visit to Merida Yucatan, Mexico, Tushi Pal founders and brothers, Arturo and Jorge Arvizu, spent time with Taller Maya. 

Taller Maya is the commercial branch of Fundación Haciendas del Mundo Maya, a foundation that represents more than 20 traditional Mayan workshops. Since then, the five partners have developed Tushi Pal, a next-generation tracker that incorporates state-of-the-art technology and distinctive, traditional work.

 

Fundación Haciendas del Mundo Maya is a nonprofit organization that works with Mayan communities in the Yucatán Peninsula. Through our Integral Community Development Program we implement projects for economic and social growth. It promotes the diffusion and conservation of Mayan natural and cultural heritage by establishing the basis to create micro-regional development poles and promoting strategies to strengthen the skills and capacities of the communities’ residents.

The Fundación’s vision, which leads with the phrase “know and understand in order to transform” is to serve as a link between the present and the past of the Mayan world by generating new opportunities for individual and social development and help find a balance between the cultural wealth and the possibilities of sustainable economic development. 

Its mission is to generate actions that promote local identity, recognition and recovery of the Mayan cultural expressions, overcoming poverty by furthering education health and sustainable development opportunities while involving the local population as promoters of their own social development. Fundación Haciendas del Mundo Maya is proud to lead with four main values, respect, transparency, responsibility and solidarity.

Taller Maya is a project developed by Fundación Haciendas del Mundo Maya, A.C as part of the Social Enterprises component in which they work with community groups to support their initiatives regarding local income generation –promote the creation of social enterprises and integrate them into the formal production sector.

Taller Maya was born when groups of rural Mayan artisans came together to preserve traditional techniques and materials, and working alongside designers created high-quality contemporary design products. The artisans enjoy support that builds and strengthens their co-ops and provides follow-up with regard to production and administration processes while quality and design standards are established and assured.

Its philosophy is based on promoting commercial equity; the foundation has supported and trained more than 500 woman artisans and currently works with 200 women in 16 communities; they constitute the co-ops that create the products Taller Maya sells. Now even woman artisans that are not part of the project have the tools and skills they need to work independently.

Taller Maya has recovered different handicraft techniques from the Yucatán Peninsula: Jipi Japa sisal (treadle loom), corchado (spinning sisal manually on one leg) and back strap loom. 

 

Sisal Costurado

Jipi Japa

Sisal Backstrap Loom

Behind the Scenes 

 

Meet the Tushi Pal Team

Risks and Challenges

Risks 
At this point of the project the risks are at a very low level because we have planned and taken care off all aspects that involve the production of Tushi Pal.

As we commented on our Bio. Our project merges 3 concepts

Technology. This part of the project is taking care off. Our production is secured by being working with the factory in previous projects. We know we can deliver and scale production if necessary.

Design. The design on the straps is already done and the factory will develop the straps according to specifications.

Tradition. In collaboration with Taller Maya we have secured the initial production.

Challenges 
Technology. We have 3 years of experience in developing technological products but it is always a challenge to keep up with the latest tech trends and implementations.

Design. We have a 35 year of experience in developing high quality designs in all kinds of media. The challenge would be to incorporate several collections that we have in mind for the straps.

Tradition. If the campaign scales it will be a challenge to deliver the unique cases according to the timeline. But we are confident that with our alliances we can manage to deliver the necessary demand.
story_txt:
Don’t be just another face in the crowd. Tushi Pal is the only fitness tracker to combine dedicated and intricate designs with innovative and potentially life-saving technology. Tushi Pal is the only wearable in the world to give you this level of technology, innovation and uniqueness in one.    With Tushi Pal, you can turn intentions into actions.Like any good fitness tracker, Tushi Pal has the ability to expertly track your movements throughout the day. From leisurely walking to hardcore workouts, Tushi Pal has your back with accurate data available at your fingertips.                                                       Tushi Pal APP Compatible with When you set Tushi Pal to the Heart Rate Mode and do any type of activity, like, walking, running, workouts, weight lifting, trekking etc… It will let you know in what stage you are in like, warming up, fat burning, doing aerobic, anaerobic and strenuous exercise by activating the “Breathing Light” in different colors, as seen above. When it comes to your heart health, you don’t want to leave anything up to chance. It doesn’t matter if you’re a marathon runner, a mom on the go or have a serious health condition- it is always important to keep track of your heart rate throughout the day to help prevent potentially serious or life-threatening conditions.Tushi Pal checks in on your heart rate automatically every 15 to 60 minutes using Tushi Pal’s 24-hour, real-time heart rate monitor.When you're working out, the heart rate “sweet spot” is known as the "target zone”, which is about 60 to 80 percent of your maximum heart rate. With Tushi Pal, you can easily get the details of your heart without sacrificing your work by long-pressing the touch button.Every Tushi Pal comes with a one-of-a-kind woven case that is handcrafted by skilled Mayan artisans. Taller Maya works in collaboration with the World Fair Trade Organization to hire these skilled individuals. Each case will be labeled with the artisans signature, which will make them unique. By purchasing a Tushi Pal, not only are you getting a high-quality, accurate tracker, but you’re helping provide jobs to those in need.To learn more about this organization and how they are helping indigenous communities, please take a look at the bottom of our campaign page.The handmade cases come in three different techniques: Jipi Japa, Sisal back strap loom or waist loom and Sisal Corchado. Your tracker’s strap will come with a dedicated, intricate design that will make you stand out in the crowd. story:
About Us

We are a group of young professionals in Mongolia. Last spring, we came up with the idea of "One Wish" to help Mongolian children with cancer. Every year, the number of children diagnosed with cancer is increasing but there aren't many organizations dedicated to helping these children. So that's why we want to keep this project going. 

Most of us have the opportunity to strive and work towards the goals we believe in. Yet for some children, that opportunity is overshadowed by unforgiving health conditions such as cancer. Medicines and chemotherapy are important but we wanted to help these children in a different way. We believe that by granting the wishes of children with such illnesses, they will have the emotional strength to overcome their illness and build a stronger will to fulfill their dreams. 

Why we need your help

To grant these children's wishes, we need the financial resource. We have done other fundraising activities in the community (speed dating, movies) and received a ton of support and this time we are counting on you. 

As a way of thanking you, we're offering drawings done by the children, calligraphy with your name, a short video about our activities. 

Please feel free to watch how we helped Sugirmaa's wishes come true here! 

The Impact

We are hoping to make the following impacts through this campaign:

  • Improve the quality of life for children through granting their wish, creating happy memories
  • Strengthen their emotional state and help battle their illness
  • Raise awareness about the importance of early diagnosis
  • Inspire and involve the community in the process

(One of the wishes of 6-year-old Sugirmaa, was to get a long hair)

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share our project and get the word out! We need to raise as much as awareness about this cause and your help is greatly appreciated!
  • Like us on Facebook!
  • Volunteer with us!

story: I am doing this for my wife. I could tell you things that would make everything sound so needy but in all honesty my wife has been giving her health to do what she loves. My wife is a home health nurse and gives everything possible to  She has a bulging disc and arthritis in her back. The procedure would basically shave part of the disc and shave some of the arthritis. We would prefer to do this than wait for her disc to blow and have to have emergent surgery where they would fuse her back. We have found that her surgery and recovery time can be done. The problem we have is that we need help paying for the procedure. We are not asking for the whole cost of the procedure just enough to cover what they are asking for upfront. I understand if you don't want to help. Please consider this; who takes care of all of us when we need medical help. My nurse gives so much for her patients and she wants to continue to give to her patients. Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thank you!

story:
Our Story

Hi, my name is Marie.  Most inconviences are met with a compromise.  Well, as I was graduating from college, there were times that I wanted to use my Iphone to watch a video, make a call using facetime or something as simple as reading a ebook on my phone.  So typically, I would hold a my phone, or lay it flat, either way, I usually became uncomfortable after a short period of time.

 

This was a compromise that was due for an upgrade.  So I came up with a design for a portable mobile device stand that can be used with any phone.  I got someone to build a prototype, and presto, I was watching videos, playing games, making calls, everthing without out having to hold the phone.

 

As time has passed, many of my friends (and even strangers) have asked where did I get it and I'd have to tell them that I had it made.  Thier response is always, "Can you have one made for me too?"

 

At that time, it was obvious that there was a need for my invention.

 

My fellow indiego'ers, please help me reach my funding goals so everyone can enjoy "The Chip."  I named it that because someone tried to ask me where I got it but couldn't find the words to say what she wanted, "Hey where did you get that, uh... uh... chip, thing."

 

So I am asking you help me help you and others enjoy the benefits of having "The Chip."

 

The Impact

We all know how it feels to be wanting to watch a movie, read a magazine, play a game, or talk on the phone, while at the diner or even at work.  It can be inconvienient.  How about your wrist, do they hurt after playing Farmville for a while?  We are hoping to make mobile devices your mobile desktop when combined with "The Chip."  Allow you the freedom of using your mobile device without holding it with your hands.  And the best part about it is that it universally fits on almost any phone and fits into a watch pocket or small purse.

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise $10,000 for the completion of the patent, production, and marketing.  If we do not reach our goal, we will take the money recieved and through our own income, chip in as much as we can so that we can complete the patenting process.

 

With your help, we can achieve this goal!  In appreciation for your support we wish to offer you some perks.  The more  you help, the bigger the perk!  Please take a look at what we offer.

Other Ways You Can Help

We would like everyone to have "The Chip," but it all starts with getting the word out.  If there is someone you think could use "The Chip" please send them this campaign's link.  The share tools available will help make it easy.

story:
We need your help to raise funding for the second annual NOLA Polar Express benefiting Children's Hospital and Ochsner in New Orleans, Louisiana. The goal is to raise toys for the kids that can't make it home for the holiday season (ages newborn to 21).

Molly Portier got the opportunity to personally hand out the toys to the kids on Christmas Eve last year, and it was an incredible experience. Bringing smiles to kids and their families this holiday season once again is our goal and our passion. We want to reach out with our music.

We are determined and driven to make this year a success. This means hosting a bigger event and raising even more toys for even more kids and creating even more smiles. 

We will be holding the event on December 7th at The Howlin' Wolf in New Orleans with a lineup of 9 talented local bands. 

Thanks for your support and we hope you have a safe, loving, and warm holiday season this year :)

 

Love,

The Wooden Wings
