Our grassroots fundraising effort is powered by YOU, and here are other ways you can help aside from donating: 


Facebook: Use the power of social networking to help us spread the word about Full Circles Foundation. Post the link to this page on your wall and on your status, and post it on friends’ walls, too!

Twitter: Tweet the link to this site!

Join Our Mailing List: Stay up to date with FCF goings-on!

Volunteer:  There are still opportunities to get involved on-the-ground with the 2012 Raleigh Strong Camp.  Fill out the volunteer application on our website to get started!
Email:  Hit up your contact list with an email about Full Circles Foundation and why you chose to donate. Make sure to include the link to this page, and let your contacts know to forward it along to their networks as well.

Word of Mouth: One of the most powerful drivers of social action is through face-to-face dialogue. Start a conversation with your friends, family, and co-workers about what we’re up to at Full Circles Foundation! Then, you can direct them to this website, and they can pass with word on to others. 


Call: If you can’t talk to your friends and family in person, give them a ring: they’d love to hear from you, and while you’re catching up you can let them know about FCF and how to support us.

story:
What is MADDIE Alert?

Its a unique device that locks and alarms doors and windows, it physically stops an intruder from entering, it does not require any tools to fit it and  can be used over and over again. The strap is anti slash proof and extremely strong. You can use it on any door or window in your home or while on holidays in accommodation such as hotels, dorms, caravan and motor homes.

If the door or window has a handle, MADDIE Alert will lock and alarm it.

How strong is MADDIE Alert

Please see our Gallery and a demonstartion of MADDIE Alert towing a 3 ton landrover.

Dont forget the strap is also antislash proof, we achieved this by incorporating steel wires into the strap. When testing the strap on doors and windows the handles would always break before the strap would seperate.


Why support MADDIE Alert?

If MADDIE Alert stops one intrusion or one abduction, then this project has been worth while doing, I hope you feel the same. You can help bring MADDIE Alert to the world by being the very first to own one!

 

Sets up in Seconds

MADDIE Alert is incredibly easy to set-up. Please see our gallery demonstrating MADDIE Alert in operation on various doors and windows.

 

Funding required to move forward

In order to make MADDIE Alert affordable to everyone we need to manufacture at least 5,000 devices on our first order. To date the patents and trade marks are registered, tooling is complete, prototypes have been built and tested and it will only take one phone call to have the first production run completed.

In order to place the first production run there is a short fall of £10,000. Any funds raised above this will allow a larger order of devices. This will give us the opportunity to start making life a bit more difficult for those who violate our homes and loved ones.

When researching MADDIE Alert we learned very quickly how cruel certain people can be and are towards children and especially those involved in child abductions. While my children were not harmed I did experience the feeling of terror and it is still very fresh in my mind. I can only imagine what a parent experiences when their child is taken. We came across some great people who are passionate about stopping any harm or exploitation of children such as Parents and Abducted Children Together known as PACT in the UK,  the National Center for Missing & Exploited Children (NCMEC) in the USA and the the Irish Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Children (ISPCA).

Our admiration for these groups dedicated  to helping parents and the protection of children has created in us a need to help them. As a result we will donate a royalty towards PACT, NCMEC and the ISPCA from the sale of every MADDIE Alert device.

Why is MADDIE Alert different from other alarms?

A hard wired or wireless alarm in most cases is triggered by a power surge, traffic vibration or an animal.

With MADDIE Alert you can be guaranteed one thing, if the alarm is triggered, someone has opened a door or window and what is  more they will not be able to come through that door or window because the device physically stops entry.

What also makes MADDIE Alert so unique is that it is mobile and requires no tools thus providing you and your loved ones with security while on the move.

 

Where did the name come from?

MADDIE Alert is an acronym for my mission statement, Make A Difference, Deter Intruder Entry.

Where did the idea come from?

Do you know the feeling a parent gets when you turn around and you can't see your child? Those terrible seconds of panic!

After an intruder entered my childrens room through a locked patio door I was left with no option but to make sure this would never happen again.

Scary Statistics

What frightened me most were the statistics I discovered for burglary and abductions.

Consider this, in 2010 there were 285,000 home burglaries in the UK, in the USA there were 2.5 million. In the same year hundreds of children were abducted in the UK and 58,000 in America, many of these children while sleeping in their bed.

Here in Ireland 85% of all burglaries take place while people are at home, that's scary.

Homes without any form of security are 300% more likely to be broken into.

It’s astonishing given how precious children are that only 17% of homes have some form of security.

Risks and challenges

Bringing a new product to market has many obstacles and one of my biggest challenges is marketing. I now realize that bringing MADDIE Alert to the market is perhaps bigger than building my first prototype. Therefore, the next biggest challenge and one I am really looking forward to is rolling out our marketing strategy. We have already got some great radio shows and editors to inform the general public about MADDIE Alert.
We would really appreciate all your help in spreading the word also and will travel to do demonstrations and interviews.



What do I get?

REWARD # 1 

Remember MADDIE Alert stickers are the first line of defense, it lets an intruder know you are prepared.

Reward No.1 - 8 Security Stickers

REWARD #2 SURFACE PATCH KIT

If you are on the move or using the device in different locations make sure you have spare Surface Patches.

Reward No.2 - Surface Patch Kit

REWARD #3  MADDIE Alert Device

Reward No.3 - MADDIE Alert Device

FAQ

Q. How long will MADDIE Alert last.

A. One side of the Surface Patch has a very high strenght adhesive that sticks to a wall or glass panel, the other side of the Surface Patch consists of engineered locking heads that engages with corresponding locking heads on the strap. The strap and Surface Patch can be engaged and disengaged up to 1,000 times.

Q.  Can the Surface Patch be removed from a surface and reused.

A. No. The Surface Patch adhesive can only be used once. The Surface Patch is a very high strength pressure sensitive adhesive, it cures when it comes in contact with any surface.

Q. How do you get the Surface Patch off a wall or window panel?

A. The Surface Patch when applied is permanent. You can get the Surface Patch off with some brute force but it is meant to stay on. I have been asked many times how will a hotel or holiday complex owner react to finding a Surface Patch stuck to their wall, I think I would say, if the premises I am staying in had adequate security measures to protect me, my property and loved ones then I would not have to use MADDIE Alert. I have designed the Surface Patch to be transparent so it is less obtrusive and almost camouflaged with the surface it is applied to. If I am staying in a property and there is a Surface Patch already on a wall adjoining a door or window, I'll be saying "Happy days", I will not have to use my own Surface Patch.

Q. Will an intruder just cut the strap?

A. The strap has been designed as an anti slash proof strap. The strap incorporates steel wires running through it which stops a knife cutting it. In most illegal entry scenarios one can be sure that when the MADDIE Alert alarm and flashing strobe light activates, that intruder will be running!

Q. How loud is the MADDIE Alert siren?

A. It is  loud, 130 decibels that is very painful to the ears. Do not  forget in addition to the alarm there is a high intensity flashing red light..

Q. How strong is MADDIE Alert?

A. It will take 350 pounds of shear holding power to break the connection on MADDIE Alert.  In actual fact, every time we tested the strap to breaking point it was the window or door handle that would break.

Q. How do I get more Surface Patches?

A. Our online shop maddiealert.com will have plenty of stock and can be purchased using a credit card or pay pal.

Q. Instead of using Surface Patches at home is there  any other way of permanently locking MADDIE Alert?

A. Yes, we include in our MADDIE Alert device kit a FREE specially designed wall bracket that allows the thumb piece on the strap to lock to the wall bracket. The bracket can be easily screwed to a wall by any DIY person.

Q. Can MADDIE Alert be used on motor homes, caravans etc?

A. MADDIE Alert works very well on these. We  came across some scary stories of criminals targeting people who holiday in motor homes. These vehicles are renowned for having little or no alarmed security.

story:
Hi, my name is Tori Kenney.  I would like to tell you a little bit about my mom's situation so that you know what you are helping us with if you are able to donate. I'm 18 years old and a senior in high school. My mom has always been a positive person and has never let things bring her down. She is my hero and is what keeps me going. She has had a lot of health problems over the last few years and she's struggling.  So I'm asking you for help.   
 In 2000,  She had thyroid cancer and had her thyroid and lymph nodes in her neck removed.  She has had yearly scans to check for malignancies.   That was just the beginning of her health scare.
In 2004, She was having a lot of back pain. She went to the doctor and found out that she had a tumor on her spinal cord, along with ruptured discs. She walked into the hospital expecting to have a tumor removed and planned on going home the next day.  She eventually left the hospital in a wheelchair. She woke up with a severe headache after her surgery and had to stay longer then anticipated.  Her recovery process was abnormally slow and after having a follow up MRI, it was discovered that she had a cerebral spinal leak.  She was admitted to the hospital for emergency surgery to repair the leak.  When she awoke from the surgery she was unable to use the whole right side of her body.  After four months of aggressive inpatient hospital therapy, she regained the use of everything but her right leg. She left the hospital in a wheelchair and has not walked since.  As you can imagine this was devastating to her and our family.  We have always tried to manage and make due with what has happened to her. We have incurred many expenses that we were not expecting. She has had several follow up back surgeries, ten in all,  and now has a spinal cord stimulator implanted to help manage the pain.  Recently, her stimulator quit working and she has not had the funds to get it repaired.  Her medical bills have been outrageous and so have her needs and costs of living.  There are still many things that need to be done to make our house wheelchair accessible.  
My dad lost his job in 2011 and decided to go back to school with hopes to have a better career and to be able to financially support her needs, as well as the needs of our family.  He will finish school in April of this year.  Our money has been exhausted.  We are barely getting by day to day.  All of our bills are extremely behind.  I have recently discovered some new research information on nerve pain and nerve transplants.  I've been looking into it and it is quite expensive.  This could mean the chance of my mom walking again.  So I'm hoping to raise money to be able to follow up on this research and be able to get her into a research program or some sort of rehabilitation process so that she can better her quality of life.  I would also use the money to help pay her costly medical bills and everyday cost of living expenses.   I would greatly appreciate any donation that you are able to give.  It will be put to good use and I will update you on her progress as soon as she is able to get into a program.

story:
Industry's First All-In-One Mobile, Medical App

  • 1 in 3 adults have high blood pressure and only ½ have it under control
  • Over 500,000 people in the United States rely on feeding tubes for survival
  • 116 million Americans regularly experience chronic pain, including the 36 million Americans who suffer from migraines
  • 1 in 100 babies born each year have a congenital heart condition
  • 26 million Americans have diabetes, and 79 million Americans have prediabetes
  • 1 in 300 boys and 1 in 333 girls will be diagnosed with cancer before their 20th birthday
  • 1 in 26 Americans will suffer from epilepsy sometime during their lifetime
  • 70% of the US population takes prescription medication

Imagine if life, even with medical needs, were simpler and more organized.  It can be.  Lionheart Innovations is proud to introduce the industry’s first all-in-one mobile, medical application, the Pocket Physician. Meant for caregivers, parents, and individual use, the Pocket Physician will allow users to track vital signs and medical events, take notes, store medical records, reference important literature, schedule appointments, calculate expenses and more.  


The vision for The Pocket Physician was not to replace doctors and medical providers, but rather to work with them to give them accurate and complete information.  Caregivers are already required to be specialists, and with this complete app they will be empowered to that end.  The Pocket Physician personal medical application is meant to help overwhelmed individuals, parents, and caregivers provide effective care by eliminating mistakes and saving valuable time.


Pledge Goals

$8,000 iOS version

$16,000 Both iOS and Android versions (see Stretch Goals below)


Proud Sponsors


http://www.utahblood.org/  

http://www.ohhello.co/  

http://g86design.com/  


http://www.ihhearts.org/  


http://www.magicfoundation.org/www




A Mom, A Son and a Lion's Heart


Three years ago our son Landen was born with a severe heart condition.  We were shocked and devastated when doctors told us that he was not expected to live to his first birthday. Our little baby boy had a hard fight ahead of him. To symbolize the courage he would need we put a stuffed lion in his bed and we gave him the middle name Lion. To us, the lion stood for strength, courage and hope, all of which we knew our son had, and would need in his fight to survive. 

When Landen was two months old, the doctors found out that his heart condition was caused by a rare disorder called LEOPARD syndrome, a RASopathy. By this time, our little Lion was in end-stage heart failure. Doctors gave us a choice: we could either take him home and enjoy what little time was left, or try for a heart transplant. We knew our little Lion had more fight in him, so we listed him for a heart transplant. On Mother’s Day, at 3 months old Landen received his life-saving gift and also another unexpected gift. Our donor family sent a little stuffed lamb that matched our son’s Lion perfectly, it had been in their daughter’s bed while she fought in the hospital. We now say “Our strong lion has the heart of a little lamb.”

Three amazing years later, we are still grateful for every day we have with our son, but with this gratitude comes unending oversight and heartfelt work. For example, our son takes multiple life-saving medications several times a day and his prescriptions are adjusted frequently. Landen has 11 doctors and has had multiple hospital stays and surgeries. He also has a feeding tube and other medical equipment with which I keep detailed records of his daily calories and fluid needs, and track his heart rate every day.  One night, exhausted from organizing, tracking and managing Landen’s medical needs, I thought to myself, "There has to be a better way… something easier, more convenient and more accurate." The Pocket Physician was created.


Achieving the LionHeart Vision

There is a better way to take care of personal and family medical needs, and our goal is to make better tools accessible to those who need it most. The LionHeart team strongly believes that the Pocket Physician will improve the quality of life for all involved. We are absolutely confident in our ability to make a product that is secure, private, and versatile.  The app will also be great for those who are just starting to do their own medical care such as teenagers and young adults.  Ultimately this application will provide a strong step towards unifying a very underdeveloped segment of the medical market: personal medical technology.

Knowing first-hand, the financial struggles those who have or take care of someone who has a medical condition can have, with co-pays, reoccurring medical bills, the cost of medications and medical equipment, we want to make this app available at no cost. In this way we will be able to reach a large audience and thereby be in a position to standardize these important tools. In order to achieve our vision, we will need the support of investment such as crowdfunding. This is a worthy cause and we encourage you to join our team. 


Mobile Features and Benefits


  • HIPAA Compliant, including secure login
  • Organize and track 3+ people
  • Medical Records Drop Box 
  • Notes section
  • Track and record more than 10 vital indicators (including vital signs, medical events, behaviors and nutrition)
  • Chart, graph and cross-reference tracking
  • Stopwatch and video record to aid in tracking
  • Alarms, track and logs medications (never forget or give the same medication twice)
  • Send notes and information to your doctor
  • Keep track of billing information
  • Track medical expenses (great for taxes)
  • Send information to insurance providers
  • Pro-plus allows additional caregiver access for teachers, babysitters, etc…
  • Store reference material on special conditions
  • Specialty features available such as special growth charts and feeding tube options
  • Download features applicable to you (make this YOUR app)
  • Keep vital data in one convenient place





FREE vs. PRO vs. PRO-Plus

FREE-version includes basic tracking features, reference material, and note taking.  This version will be available one device and will only be available for one caregiver and one case (patient). 

PRO-version provides a fully customizable interface and options to use all of the tracking functionality. Caregivers are able to send reports, schedule events, import medical information, and create charts. 

The PRO PLUS –version is designed for those that have support staff, such as school aides, babysitters, nurses, therapists, and even the patient themselves. This version allows an additional caregiver to make updates in specified tracking applications at your discretion. 


Market Research

In order to learn the needs of the market, we sent a survey to 250 people, age ranges 18 to 70.  We asked simple questions about their healthcare, and their need for a tracking app like this. Even we were surprised by the results:  

Question:  In an All-in-One Tracking App, what options would be useful?


Question:  Is having ALL your families medical records and daily medical needs in one convenient place beneficial?


Question:  How many specific individuals do you know that could benefit from an all-in-one medical tracking app?  

         Answers ranged from 2-100's, even 1,000s


The Investment

LionHeart Innovations has already invested significant time and money to put together the mobile app framework as well as the best team to do it. Our highly qualified development partner, TekVitals, has a strong stake in this project and has already put together the framework to make a successful application. TekVitals specialty is in medical software applications. They are very familiar with HIPAA regulations, and they also employ leading compliance experts who will consult on this project. Much of the risk in creating a mobile application is mitigated by this strong coalition, and by the preparation that has already been done.

TekVitals CEO, Ryan Bakow, is a strong believer in this project The Pocket Physician, he says:

“When I first heard Tammy’s story and her idea, I was immediately struck by her passion and her vision for this project. Tammy knows firsthand the struggles millions go through in caring for loved ones. I pledged to her my full support, and I stand by my promise. This application has the potential to make real change and to me is a worthwhile cause to support.”

                                                                                      – Ryan Bakow – CEO TekVitals

Other than their enterprise application, many of TekVitals smaller apps can be found in the Apple store, for example:

 Business

    https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/mifunnel-sales-tracking-reporting/id616469610?mt=8

    http://www.click4compliance.com/course/mobile-compliance-officer-app/

Realty Apps

    https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/id698030434?mt=8

    https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/advantage-realty-group/id608155124?mt=8

    https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/sonny-kwan/id517166318?mt=8

    https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/american-classic-homes/id543405870?mt=8

    https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/my-team-one/id568279095?mt=8

    https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/santa-clarita-real-estate/id597802228?mt=8

Utility apps:

    https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/gold-silver-spot-market-vault/id507343539?mt=8

    https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/net-utilities/id548195984?mt=8


Pledge Rewards

NOTE: 

  • All DONATED items will be donated to a Children's Hospital
  • If you feel someone else could use your Pocket Physician more they can be SHARED or DONATED
  • Pledges: you can upgrade from Pro-Version to Pro-Version Plus on all rewards for $5 more
  • T-shirts will be professionally designed with the LionHeart image


LionHeart Warriors


Stretch Goals

$16,000     Android-version of app

$16,000+  TBA (includes more features, customization and medical conferences)


Other Ways to Help

Even if you are unable to contribute, the biggest difference you can make is to spread the word.  This is the best way to help us succeed and make The Pocket Physician available to all:

  • Share on Facebook
  • Tweet and re-tweet about us
  • Email your friends and family


Risks and Challenges

There are many risks involved with a project such as this. However, we feel extremely confident that we can mitigate each one and build a successful product.  The principle risks are that: 1) the project development will go over budget and hinder the launch. 2) our user base will not regularly use this app and/or see a need for it. And 3) the application will not have enough flexibility to cater to all of our customers. Concerning the first risk, we have partnered our development with a company called TekVitals Medical out of Utah. They specialize in medical software applications and have worked out a deal with us that assures we will get the app finished on time and under budget. TekVitals is a valuable partner and has a track record of delivering their products and services. Regarding the second, we have invested our own time and money into considerable market research. This has helped us to learn that not only is this app viable over multiple customer types, it would be used on a daily basis. The third concern is the most difficult, because although we want to be the “all-in-one” app there are hundreds of conditions. We have worked to include all of the major areas that need tracking, including things like blood sugar and heart rate. We have also enabled a system to help us get real time feedback from our clients so that we can continue to add major tracking elements for their benefit. We have done our homework and we know we will be able to provide a top notch experience.


Hear from others

"Most of us have tried unsuccessfully to find a good app to help meet all of the needs we have of caring for our kids!  This is going to be a game changer!"

-Jessie Richens

“I wish my mom had this when caring for her parents.”

-Shauntelle Stephenson

“This app would not only help me and my children, but my family also, if they ever had to take over for me, they would have everything they need at their fingertips.”

  -Laura Gardner

“There is such a strong need for this app. I have a medically fragile child, this app will help me be able to focus on her needs rather than worry about all of the paperwork and things I need to keep track of and appointments, etc. This app will help me keep all of her information in one place, rather than the multiple places I now have it.”

  -Michelle Doman

“Having all of these helpful resources in one place would help me eliminate mistakes and make it less stressful for my family.”

  -Breanna Sartor

I absolutely need an app like LionHeart Innovations: The Pocket Physician. Goodbye 5 pound spiral notebook with barely legible information. 

 -Kate Hutchens


FAQ

Have a question? If the info above doesn't help, you can ask the project creator directly.


LionHeart in the Media

http://www.heraldextra.com/


Lion in the News

story_txt:
Industry's First All-In-One Mobile, Medical App
1 in 3 adults have high blood pressure and only ½ have it under control

Over 500,000 people in the United States rely on feeding tubes for
survival

116 million Americans regularly experience chronic pain, including
the 36 million Americans who suffer from migraines

1 in 100 babies born each year have a congenital heart condition

26 million Americans have diabetes, and 79 million Americans have prediabetes

1 in 300 boys and 1 in 333 girls will be diagnosed with cancer before
their 20th birthday

1 in 26 Americans will suffer from epilepsy sometime during their
lifetime
70%
of the US population takes prescription medication
Imagine if life, even with medical needs, were simpler and more
organized.  It can be.  Lionheart Innovations is proud to introduce
the industry’s first all-in-one mobile, medical application, the Pocket
Physician. Meant for caregivers, parents, and individual use, the Pocket
Physician will allow users to track vital signs and medical events, take notes,
store medical records, reference important literature, schedule appointments,
calculate expenses and more.  The vision
for The Pocket Physician was not to replace doctors and medical providers, but
rather to work with them to give them accurate and complete information.  Caregivers are already required to be specialists,
and with this complete app they will be empowered to that end.  The Pocket Physician personal medical
application is meant to help overwhelmed individuals, parents, and caregivers
provide effective care by eliminating mistakes and saving valuable time.Pledge Goals$8,000 iOS version$16,000 Both iOS and Android versions (see Stretch Goals below)Proud Sponsorshttp://www.utahblood.org/  http://www.ohhello.co/  http://g86design.com/  http://www.ihhearts.org/  http://www.magicfoundation.org/www
A Mom, A Son and a Lion's Heart
Three years ago our son
Landen was born with a severe heart condition.  We were shocked and
devastated when doctors told us that he was not expected to live to his
first birthday. Our little baby boy had a hard fight ahead of him. To symbolize
the courage he would need we put a stuffed lion in his bed and we gave him the
middle name Lion. To us, the lion stood for strength, courage and hope, all of
which we knew our son had, and would need in his fight to survive. 
When Landen was two months
old, the doctors found out that his heart condition was caused by a rare
disorder called LEOPARD syndrome, a RASopathy. By this time, our little Lion
was in end-stage heart failure. Doctors gave us a choice: we could either take
him home and enjoy what little time was left, or try for a heart transplant. We
knew our little Lion had more fight in him, so we listed him for a heart
transplant. On Mother’s Day, at 3 months old Landen received his life-saving
gift and also another unexpected gift. Our donor family sent a little stuffed
lamb that matched our son’s Lion perfectly, it had been in their daughter’s bed
while she fought in the hospital. We now say “Our strong lion has the heart of
a little lamb.”
Three amazing years later,
we are still grateful for every day we have with our son, but with this
gratitude comes unending oversight and heartfelt work. For example, our son
takes multiple life-saving medications several times a day and his
prescriptions are adjusted frequently. Landen has 11 doctors and has had
multiple hospital stays and surgeries. He also has a feeding tube and other
medical equipment with which I keep detailed records of his daily calories and
fluid needs, and track his heart rate every day.  One night, exhausted
from organizing, tracking and managing Landen’s medical needs, I thought to
myself, "There has to be a better way… something easier, more convenient
and more accurate." The Pocket Physician was created.Achieving the LionHeart Vision
There is a better way to
take care of personal and family medical needs, and our goal is to make better
tools accessible to those who need it most. The LionHeart team strongly
believes that the Pocket Physician will improve the quality of life for all
involved. We are absolutely confident in our ability to make a product that is
secure, private, and versatile.  The app
will also be great for those who are just starting to do their own medical care
such as teenagers and young adults.  Ultimately this application will
provide a strong step towards unifying a very underdeveloped segment of the
medical market: personal medical technology.
Knowing first-hand, the
financial struggles those who have or take care of someone who has a medical
condition can have, with co-pays, reoccurring medical bills, the cost of
medications and medical equipment, we want to make this app available at no
cost. In this way we will be able to reach a large audience and thereby be in a
position to standardize these important tools. In order to achieve our vision,
we will need the support of investment such as crowdfunding. This is
a worthy cause and we encourage you to join our team. Mobile Features and Benefits
HIPAA Compliant, including secure login

Organize and track 3+ people

Medical Records Drop Box 
Notes section

Track and record more than 10 vital indicators (including vital signs, medical events, behaviors and nutrition)

Chart, graph and cross-reference tracking
Stopwatch and video record to aid in tracking
Alarms, track and logs medications (never forget or give the same medication twice)
Send notes and information to your doctor

Keep track of billing information

Track medical expenses (great for taxes)
Send information to insurance providers

Pro-plus allows additional caregiver access for teachers, babysitters, etc…

Store reference material on special conditions

Specialty features available such as special growth charts and feeding tube options
Download features applicable to you (make this YOUR app)
Keep vital data in one convenient place
FREE vs. PRO vs. PRO-Plus
FREE-version includes
basic tracking features, reference material, and note taking.  This
version will be available one device and will only be available for one
caregiver and one case (patient). 
PRO-version provides a
fully customizable interface and options to use all of the tracking
functionality. Caregivers are able to send reports, schedule events, import
medical information, and create charts. 
The PRO PLUS –version
is designed for those that have support staff, such as school aides,
babysitters, nurses, therapists, and even the patient themselves. This version
allows an additional caregiver to make updates in specified tracking
applications at your discretion. Market Research
In order to learn the needs
of the market, we sent a survey to 250 people, age ranges 18 to 70.  We
asked simple questions about their healthcare, and their need for a tracking
app like this. Even we were surprised by the results:  
Question:  In an
All-in-One Tracking App, what options would be useful?

Question:  Is having
ALL your families medical records and daily medical needs in one convenient
place beneficial?


Question:  How many
specific individuals do you know that could benefit from an all-in-one medical
tracking app?  
       
 Answers ranged from 2-100's, even 1,000sThe InvestmentLionHeart Innovations has already invested significant time and money to
put together the mobile app framework as well as the best team to do it. Our
highly qualified development partner, TekVitals, has a strong stake in this
project and has already put together the framework to make a successful
application. TekVitals specialty is in medical software applications. They are very familiar with HIPAA regulations, and they also employ leading compliance
experts who will consult on this project. Much of the risk in creating a mobile
application is mitigated by this strong coalition, and by the preparation that
has already been done.TekVitals CEO, Ryan Bakow, is a strong believer in this project The Pocket Physician, he says:“When I first heard Tammy’s story and her idea, I was immediately
struck by her passion and her vision for this project. Tammy knows firsthand
the struggles millions go through in caring for loved ones. I pledged to her my
full support, and I stand by my promise. This application has the potential to
make real change and to me is a worthwhile cause to support.”
                                                                                      – Ryan Bakow – CEO TekVitalsOther than their enterprise application, many of TekVitals smaller apps can be found in the Apple store, for
example:
 Business
    https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/mifunnel-sales-tracking-reporting/id616469610?mt=8
    http://www.click4compliance.com/course/mobile-compliance-officer-app/
Realty Apps
    https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/id698030434?mt=8
    https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/advantage-realty-group/id608155124?mt=8
    https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/sonny-kwan/id517166318?mt=8
    https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/american-classic-homes/id543405870?mt=8
    https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/my-team-one/id568279095?mt=8
    https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/santa-clarita-real-estate/id597802228?mt=8
Utility apps:
    https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/gold-silver-spot-market-vault/id507343539?mt=8
    https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/net-utilities/id548195984?mt=8Pledge RewardsNOTE: 
All DONATED items will be donated to a Children's Hospital
If you feel someone else could use your Pocket Physician more they can be SHARED or DONATED

T-shirts will be professionally designed with the LionHeart image

can make is to spread the word.  This is
the best way to help us succeed and make The Pocket Physician available to all:
Share on Facebook
Tweet and re-tweet about us
Email your friends and family

There are many risks
involved with a project such as this. However, we feel extremely confident that
we can mitigate each one and build a successful product.  The principle

get the app finished on time and under budget. TekVitals is a valuable partner
and has a track record of delivering their products and services. Regarding the
second, we have invested our own time and money into considerable market

multiple customer types, it would be used on a daily basis. The third concern
is the most difficult, because although we want to be the “all-in-one” app
there are hundreds of conditions. We have worked to include all of the major
areas that need tracking, including things like blood sugar and heart rate. We
have also enabled a system to help us get real time feedback from our clients
so that we can continue to add major tracking elements for their benefit. We
have done our homework and we know we will be able to provide a top notch
experience.Hear from others
"Most of us have tried
unsuccessfully to find a good app to help meet all of the needs we have of
caring for our kids!  This is going to be a game changer!"
-Jessie
Richens

-Shauntelle Stephenson

and my children, but my family also, if they ever had to take over for me, they
would have everything they need at their fingertips.”
  -Laura
Gardner

story:
Be a part of an innovative new fitness system that will revolutionize free weight training! 

My Story

My name is Maryellen Bowman. I am a Registered Nurse and fitness professional with over 25 years of experience in the industry.  I founded Strength Innovations, LLC in 2009 in order to launch Quick Click Weight Training System, a new product and program that transforms traditional barbell systems and takes them to a whole new level.

I conceived the idea for Quick Click while teaching group weight training classes. I watched my clients, especially women, struggle to change weights on the barbell to accommodate different exercises. I’m sure you can relate to their frustration. It’s a difficult process to load and unload the weights using clamps or springs. This changeover process slows and interrupts the flow of the workout, hinders the ability to sequence exercises to maximize effectiveness, and actually intimidates some people from weight training at all.

Inspired by what I had observed in my class, I invented a user-friendly weight training system that would allow for quick, convenient transitions in weight. The result is a product that loads and unloads in an instant and doesn’t require the use of clamps. It can be used by adults of all ages at home or in a fitness facility and in an individual or group setting.

After years of product development, I am proud to have secured a utility patent, manufacturers and distributors.  With your help, I can finally bring Quick Click to market!

Product Features You Will Appreciate

Easy to Load

  • Weights lock in place without springs or clamps.
  • Weights “click” into place as you slide or spear the bar through the weight.
  • Weights release with a push of the safety locking lever.

Easy to Use

  • Weights lock in place, permitting full range of motion in all planes of movement.
  • The entire unit can stand on end, allowing for vertical format exercises.
  • Quick weight transitions allow for a fast-paced workout.

Easy to Store

  • Weights stack like cones.
  • The entire unit stands upright and takes up less space than a vacuum.

Quick Click also includes a kettlebell attachment.  Current kettlebells have only one weight available per bell.  The Quick Click’s innovative design allows you to easily change the weight of your kettlebell using the same weights as the barbell unit. Quick Click will come with a variety of workouts including strength and conditioning, mixed cardio/conditioning, yoga and Pilates, and individual body segments. They will be available via DVDs, website subscriptions and podcasts.

How You Can Help

Your contribution will enable me to turn my invention into a reality. With $100,000 in start-up capital, Strength Innovations will be able to fund the first production of the Quick Click product line. Quick Click will be sold to fitness centers, retail stores, physical therapy facilities, spas, hotels, schools, universities, and on the web.

Your investment in my company will help me realize my dream of making a weight training system that is non-intimidating, smooth, simple, and fun. Patent officers and manufacturers who have seen Quick Click believe it will revolutionize the weight training industry. There are emerging imitators, but this is the original quick release weight system.

For your support, I will give you a certificate worth more than the value of your contribution to use toward the product line.  The certificates will be mailed by May 1, 2013 and can be applied toward a purchase of our products until June 1, 2014.

Every level of contribution is greatly appreciated.  Please spread the word about Quick Click by forwarding this page to your friends and posting it on your Facebook, Twitter, and other social media accounts.

Thank you for your generous support! I look forward to sharing with you Quick Click and other Strength Innovations products and programs in the near future!

story: HELP! I need some immediate help from my friends. I am desperately trying to reclaim my father's health care proxy from family members who would strip me, in court, of my ability to care for my father and tend to his daily needs. While I have incurred over $60,000 in legal fees and will pay these off over time, I am unable to pay for the necessary PROFESSIONAL TESTIMONIALS provided by my father's doctors. These are fees required by the hospital and health care professionals in order to come to court to testify on my father's behalf. I have received ONE request for $500 payable in advance and two more are pending. I am FLAT BROKE and am barely surviving. I ask you most humbly and wouldn't make this request if it wasn't absolutely beyond my own capabilities right now. Anything will help and thank you sincerely.
